GSD36manu2p_u:1: pratipūjya yathānyāyam idaṃ vacanam abruvan // Mn_1.1 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3: antaraprabhavānāṃ ca dharmān no vaktum arhasi // Mn_1.2 //
GSD36manu2p_u:4: tvam eko hy asya sarvasya vidhānasya svayaṃbhuvaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:6: sa taiḥ pṛṣṭas tathā samyag amitaujā mahātmabhiḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:7: pratyuvācārcya tān sarvān maharṣīñ śrūyatām iti // Mn_1.4 //
GSD36manu2p_u:9: apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ prasuptam iva sarvataḥ // Mn_1.5 //
GSD36manu2p_u:10: tataḥ svayaṃbhūr bhagavān avyakto vyañjayann idam /
GSD36manu2p_u:11: mahābhūtādi vṛttaujāḥ prādur āsīt tamonudaḥ // Mn_1.6 //
GSD36manu2p_u:13: sarvabhūtamayo 'cintyaḥ sa eva svayam udbabhau // Mn_1.7 //
GSD36manu2p_u:14: so 'bhidhyāya śarīrāt svāt sisṛkṣur vividhāḥ prajāḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:15: apa eva sasarjādau tāsu vīryam avāsṛjat // Mn_1.8 //
GSD36manu2p_u:17: tasmiñ jajñe svayaṃ brahmā sarvalokapitāmahaḥ // Mn_1.9 //
GSD36manu2p_u:18: āpo narā iti proktā āpo vai narasūnavaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:19: tā yad asyāyanaṃ pūrvaṃ tena nārāyaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // Mn_1.10 //
GSD36manu2p_u:20: yat tat kāraṇam avyaktaṃ nityaṃ sadasadātmakaṃ /
GSD36manu2p_u:21: tadvisṛṣṭaḥ sa puruṣo loke brahmeti kīrtyate // Mn_1.11 //
GSD36manu2p_u:22: tasminn aṇḍe sa bhagavān uṣitvā parivatsaram /
GSD36manu2p_u:23: svayam evātmano dhyānāt tad aṇḍam akarod dvidhā // Mn_1.12 //
GSD36manu2p_u:24: tābhyāṃ sa śakalābhyāṃ ca divaṃ bhūmiṃ ca nirmame /
GSD36manu2p_u:25: madhye vyoma diśaś cāṣṭāv apāṃ sthānaṃ ca śāśvataṃ // Mn_1.13 //
GSD36manu2p_u:27: manasaś cāpy ahaṃkāram abhimantāram īśvaram // Mn_1.14 //
GSD36manu2p_u:28: mahāntam eva cātmānaṃ sarvāṇi triguṇāni ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:29: viṣayāṇāṃ grahītṝṇi śanaiḥ pañcendriyāṇi ca // Mn_1.15 //
GSD36manu2p_u:30: teṣāṃ tv avayavān sūkṣmān ṣaṇṇām apy amitaujasām /
GSD36manu2p_u:32: yan mūrtyavayavāḥ sūkṣmās tānīmāny āśrayanti ṣaṭ /
GSD36manu2p_u:33: tasmāc charīram ity āhus tasya mūrtiṃ manīṣiṇaḥ // Mn_1.17 //
GSD36manu2p_u:34: tad āviśanti bhūtāni mahānti saha karmabhiḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:35: manaś cāvayavaiḥ sūkṣmaiḥ sarvabhūtakṛd avyayam // Mn_1.18 //
GSD36manu2p_u:36: teṣām idaṃ tu saptānāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ mahaujasām /
GSD36manu2p_u:37: sūkṣmābhyo mūrtimātrābhyaḥ saṃbhavaty avyayād vyayam // Mn_1.19 //
GSD36manu2p_u:38: ādyādyasya guṇaṃ tv eṣām avāpnoti paraḥ paraḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:39: yo yo yāvatithaś caiṣāṃ sa sa tāvad guṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // Mn_1.20 //
GSD36manu2p_u:40: sarveṣāṃ tu sa nāmāni karmāṇi ca pṛthak pṛthak /
GSD36manu2p_u:41: vedaśabdebhya evādau pṛthak saṃsthāś ca nirmame // Mn_1.21 //
GSD36manu2p_u:42: karmātmanāṃ ca devānāṃ so 'sṛjat prāṇināṃ prabhuḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:43: sādhyānāṃ ca gaṇaṃ sūkṣmaṃ yajñaṃ caiva sanātanam // Mn_1.22 //
GSD36manu2p_u:46: kālaṃ kālavibhaktīś ca nakṣatrāṇi grahāṃs tathā /
GSD36manu2p_u:47: saritaḥ sāgarāñ śailān samāni viṣamāni ca // Mn_1.24 //
GSD36manu2p_u:48: tapo vācaṃ ratiṃ caiva kāmaṃ ca krodham eva ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:49: sṛṣṭiṃ sasarja caivemāṃ sraṣṭum icchann imāḥ prajāḥ // Mn_1.25 //
GSD36manu2p_u:51: dvandvair ayojayac cemāḥ sukhaduḥkhādibhiḥ prajāḥ // Mn_1.26 //
GSD36manu2p_u:52: aṇvyo mātrā vināśinyo daśārdhānāṃ tu yāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:53: tābhiḥ sārdham idaṃ sarvaṃ saṃbhavaty anupūrvaśaḥ // Mn_1.27 //
GSD36manu2p_u:54: yaṃ tu karmaṇi yasmin sa nyayuṅkta prathamaṃ prabhuḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:55: sa tad eva svayaṃ bheje sṛjyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ // Mn_1.28 //
GSD36manu2p_u:57: yad yasya so 'dadhāt sarge tat tasya svayam āviśat // Mn_1.29 //
GSD36manu2p_u:58: yathā rtuliṅgāny ṛtavaḥ svayam eva rtuparyaye /
GSD36manu2p_u:59: svāni svāny abhipadyante tathā karmāṇi dehinaḥ // Mn_1.30 //
GSD36manu2p_u:61: brāhmaṇaṃ kṣatriyaṃ vaiśyaṃ śūdraṃ ca niravartayat // Mn_1.31 //
GSD36manu2p_u:63: ardhena nārī tasyāṃ sa virājam asṛjat prabhuḥ // Mn_1.32 //
GSD36manu2p_u:64: tapas taptvāsṛjad yaṃ tu sa svayaṃ puruṣo virāṭ /
GSD36manu2p_u:65: taṃ māṃ vittāsya sarvasya sraṣṭāraṃ dvijasattamāḥ // Mn_1.33 //
GSD36manu2p_u:66: ahaṃ prajāḥ sisṛkṣus tu tapas taptvā suduścaram /
GSD36manu2p_u:67: patīn prajānām asṛjaṃ maharṣīn ādito daśa // Mn_1.34 //
GSD36manu2p_u:69: pracetasaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ ca bhṛguṃ nāradam eva ca // Mn_1.35 //
GSD36manu2p_u:70: ete manūṃs tu saptān yān asṛjan bhūritejasaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:71: devān devanikāyāṃś ca maharṣīṃś cāmitaujasaḥ // Mn_1.36 //
GSD36manu2p_u:73: nāgān sarpān suparṇāṃś ca pitṝṇāṃś ca pṛthaggaṇam // Mn_1.37 //
GSD36manu2p_u:75: ulkānirghātaketūṃś ca jyotīṃṣy uccāvacāni ca // Mn_1.38 //
GSD36manu2p_u:76: kinnarān vānarān matsyān vividhāṃś ca vihaṅgamān /
GSD36manu2p_u:77: paśūn mṛgān manuṣyāṃś ca vyālāṃś cobhayatodataḥ // Mn_1.39 //
GSD36manu2p_u:79: sarvaṃ ca daṃśamaśakaṃ sthāvaraṃ ca pṛthagvidham // Mn_1.40 //
GSD36manu2p_u:80: evam etair idaṃ sarvaṃ manniyogān mahātmabhiḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:82: yeṣāṃ tu yādṛṣaṃ karma bhūtānām iha kīrtitam /
GSD36manu2p_u:83: tat tathā vo 'bhidhāsyāmi kramayogaṃ ca janmani // Mn_1.42 //
GSD36manu2p_u:84: paśavaś ca mṛgāś caiva vyālāś cobhayatodataḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:85: rakṣāṃsi ca piśācāś ca manuṣyāś ca jarāyujāḥ // Mn_1.43 //
GSD36manu2p_u:86: aṇḍājāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ sarpā nakrā matsyāś ca kacchapāḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:87: yāni caivaM: prakārāṇi sthalajāny audakāni ca // Mn_1.44 //
GSD36manu2p_u:89: ūṣmaṇaś copajāyante yac cānyat kiṃ cid īdṛṣam // Mn_1.45 //
GSD36manu2p_u:92: apuṣpāḥ phalavanto ye te vanaspatayaḥ smṛtāḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:93: puṣpiṇaḥ phalinaś caiva vṛkṣās tūbhayataḥ smṛtāḥ // Mn_1.47 //
GSD36manu2p_u:95: bījakāṇḍaruhāṇy eva pratānā vallya eva ca // Mn_1.48 //
GSD36manu2p_u:100: evaṃ sarvaṃ sa sṛṣṭvedaṃ māṃ cācintyaparākramaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:101: ātmany antardadhe bhūyaḥ kālaṃ kālena pīḍayan // Mn_1.51 //
GSD36manu2p_u:102: yadā sa devo jāgarti tad evaṃ ceṣṭate jagat /
GSD36manu2p_u:103: yadā svapiti śāntātmā tadā sarvaṃ nimīlati // Mn_1.52 //
GSD36manu2p_u:104: tasmin svapiti tu svasthe karmātmānaḥ śarīriṇaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:105: svakarmabhyo nivartante manaś ca glānim ṛcchati // Mn_1.53 //
GSD36manu2p_u:106: yugapat tu pralīyante yadā tasmin mahātmani /
GSD36manu2p_u:107: tadāyaṃ sarvabhūtātmā sukhaṃ svapiti nirvṛtaḥ // Mn_1.54 //
GSD36manu2p_u:108: tamo 'yaṃ tu samāśritya ciraṃ tiṣṭhati sendriyaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:109: na ca svaṃ kurute karma tadotkrāmati mūrtitaḥ // Mn_1.55 //
GSD36manu2p_u:110: yadāṇumātriko bhūtvā bījaṃ sthāsnu cariṣṇu ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:111: samāviśati saṃsṛṣṭas tadā mūrtiṃ vimuñcati // Mn_1.56 //
GSD36manu2p_u:112: evaṃ sa jāgratsvapnābhyām idaṃ sarvaṃ carācaram /
GSD36manu2p_u:114: idaṃ śāstraṃ tu kṛtvāsau mām eva svayam āditaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:115: vidhivad grāhayām āsa marīcyādīṃs tv ahaṃ munīn // Mn_1.58 //
GSD36manu2p_u:116: etad vo 'yaṃ bhṛguḥ śāstraṃ śrāvayiṣyaty aśesataḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:117: etad dhi matto 'dhijage sarvam eṣo 'khilaṃ muniḥ // Mn_1.59 //
GSD36manu2p_u:118: tatas tathā sa tenokto maharṣimanunā bhṛguḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:119: tān abravīd ṛṣīn sarvān prītātmā śrūyatām iti // Mn_1.60 //
GSD36manu2p_u:121: sṛṣṭavantaḥ prajāḥ svāḥ svā mahātmāno mahaujasaḥ // Mn_1.61 //
GSD36manu2p_u:122: svārociṣaś cottamaś ca tāmaso raivatas tathā /
GSD36manu2p_u:123: cākṣuṣaś ca mahātejā vivasvatsuta eva ca // Mn_1.62 //
GSD36manu2p_u:125: sve sve 'ntare sarvam idam utpādyāpuś carācaram // Mn_1.63 //
GSD36manu2p_u:126: nimeṣā daśa cāṣṭau ca kāṣṭhā triṃśat tu tāḥ kalā /
GSD36manu2p_u:127: triṃśat kalā muhūrtaḥ syād ahorātraṃ tu tāvataḥ // Mn_1.64 //
GSD36manu2p_u:129: rātriḥ svapnāya bhūtānāṃ ceṣṭāyai karmaṇām ahaḥ // Mn_1.65 //
GSD36manu2p_u:130: pitrye rātryahanī māsaḥ pravibhāgas tu pakṣayoḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:131: karmaceṣṭāsv ahaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ śuklaḥ svapnāya śarvarī // Mn_1.66 //
GSD36manu2p_u:132: daive rātryahanī varṣaṃ pravibhāgas tayoḥ punaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:133: ahas tatrodagayanaṃ rātriḥ syād dakṣiṇāyanam // Mn_1.67 //
GSD36manu2p_u:134: brāhmasya tu kṣapāhasya yat pramāṇaṃ samāsataḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:135: ekaikaśo yugānāṃ tu kramaśas tan nibodhata // Mn_1.68 //
GSD36manu2p_u:136: catvāry āhuḥ sahasrāṇi varsāṇāṃ tat kṛtaṃ yugam /
GSD36manu2p_u:137: tasya tāvac chatī saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśaś ca tathāvidhaḥ // Mn_1.69 //
GSD36manu2p_u:139: ekāpāyena vartante sahasrāṇi śatāni ca // Mn_1.70 //
GSD36manu2p_u:140: yad etat parisaṃkhyātam ādāv eva caturyugam /
GSD36manu2p_u:141: etad dvādaśasāhasraṃ devānāṃ yugam ucyate // Mn_1.71 //
GSD36manu2p_u:143: brāhmam ekam ahar jñeyaṃ tāvatīṃ rātrim eva ca // Mn_1.72 //
GSD36manu2p_u:144: tad vai yugasahasrāntaṃ brāhmaṃ puṇyam ahar viduḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:145: rātriṃ ca tāvatīm eva te 'horātravido janāḥ // Mn_1.73 //
GSD36manu2p_u:147: pratibuddhaś ca sṛjati manaḥ sadasadātmakam // Mn_1.74 //
GSD36manu2p_u:149: ākāśaṃ jāyate tasmāt tasya śabdaṃ guṇaṃ viduḥ // Mn_1.75 //
GSD36manu2p_u:151: balavāñ jāyate vāyuḥ sa vai sparśaguṇo mataḥ // Mn_1.76 //
GSD36manu2p_u:153: jyotir utpadyate bhāsvat tad rūpaguṇam ucyate // Mn_1.77 //
GSD36manu2p_u:154: jyotiṣaś ca vikurvāṇād āpo rasaguṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:155: adbhyo gandhaguṇā bhūmir ity eṣā sṛṣṭir āditaḥ // Mn_1.78 //
GSD36manu2p_u:156: yad prāg dvādaśasāhasram uditaṃ daivikaṃ yugam /
GSD36manu2p_u:158: manvantarāṇy asaṃkhyāni sargaḥ saṃhāra eva ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:159: krīḍann ivaitat kurute parameṣṭhī punaḥ punaḥ // Mn_1.80 //
GSD36manu2p_u:160: catuṣpāt sakalo dharmaḥ satyaṃ caiva kṛte yuge /
GSD36manu2p_u:161: nādharmeṇāgamaḥ kaś cin manuṣyān prati vartate // Mn_1.81 //
GSD36manu2p_u:162: itareṣv āgamād dharmaḥ pādaśas tv avaropitaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:165: kṛte tretādiṣu hy eṣāṃ āyur hrasati pādaśaḥ // Mn_1.83 //
GSD36manu2p_u:166: vedoktam āyur martyānām āśiṣaś caiva karmaṇām /
GSD36manu2p_u:167: phalanty anuyugaṃ loke prabhāvaś ca śarīriṇām // Mn_1.84 //
GSD36manu2p_u:170: tapaḥ paraṃ kṛtayuge tretāyāṃ jñānam ucyate /
GSD36manu2p_u:171: dvāpare yajñam evāhur dānam ekaṃ kalau yuge // Mn_1.86 //
GSD36manu2p_u:172: sarvasyāsya tu sargasya guptyarthaṃ sa mahādyutiḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:175: dānaṃ pratigrahaṃ caiva brāhmaṇānām akalpayat // Mn_1.88 //
GSD36manu2p_u:176: prajānāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ dānam ijyādhyayanam eva ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:177: viṣayeṣv aprasaktiś ca kṣatriyasya samāsataḥ // Mn_1.89 //
GSD36manu2p_u:178: paśūnāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ dānam ijyādhyayanam eva ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:179: vaṇikpathaṃ kusīdaṃ ca vaiśyasya kṛṣim eva ca // Mn_1.90 //
GSD36manu2p_u:180: ekam eva tu śūdrasya prabhuḥ karma samādiśat /
GSD36manu2p_u:181: eteṣām eva varṇānāṃ śuśrūṣām anasūyayā // Mn_1.91 //
GSD36manu2p_u:183: tasmān medhyatamaṃ tv asya mukham uktaṃ svayaṃbhuvā // Mn_1.92 //
GSD36manu2p_u:185: sarvasyaivāsya sargasya dharmato brāhmaṇaḥ prabhuḥ // Mn_1.93 //
GSD36manu2p_u:186: taṃ hi svayaṃbhūḥ svād āsyāt tapas taptvādito 'sṛjat /
GSD36manu2p_u:189: kavyāni caiva pitaraḥ kiṃ bhūtam adhikaṃ tataḥ // Mn_1.95 //
GSD36manu2p_u:191: buddhimatsu narāḥ śreṣṭhā nareṣu brāhmaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // Mn_1.96 //
GSD36manu2p_u:194: utpattir eva viprasya mūrtir dharmasya śāśvatī /
GSD36manu2p_u:195: sa hi dharmārtham utpanno brahmabhūyāya kalpate // Mn_1.98 //
GSD36manu2p_u:198: sarvaṃ svaṃ brāhmaṇasyedaṃ yat kiṃ cij jagatīgataṃ /
GSD36manu2p_u:200: svam eva brāhmaṇo bhuṅkte svaṃ vaste svaṃ dadāti ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:201: ānṛśaṃsyād brāhmaṇasya bhuñjate hītare janāḥ // Mn_1.101 //
GSD36manu2p_u:203: svāyaṃbhuvo manur dhīmān idaṃ śāstram akalpayat // Mn_1.102 //
GSD36manu2p_u:205: śiśyebhyaś ca pravaktavyaṃ samyaṅ nānyena kena cit // Mn_1.103 //
GSD36manu2p_u:207: manovāggehajair nityaṃ karmadoṣair na lipyate // Mn_1.104 //
GSD36manu2p_u:208: punāti paṅktiṃ vaṃśyāṃś ca saptasapta parāvarān /
GSD36manu2p_u:209: pṛthivīm api caivemāṃ kṛtsnām eko 'pi so 'rhati // Mn_1.105 //
GSD36manu2p_u:211: idaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyam idaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ param // Mn_1.106 //
GSD36manu2p_u:213: caturṇām api varṇānām ācāraś caiva śāśvataḥ // Mn_1.107 //
GSD36manu2p_u:214: ācāraḥ paramo dharmaḥ śrutyuktaḥ smārta eva ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:215: tasmād asmin sadā yukto nityaṃ syād ātmavān dvijaḥ // Mn_1.108 //
GSD36manu2p_u:216: ācārād vicyuto vipro na vedaphalam aśnute /
GSD36manu2p_u:217: ācāreṇa tu saṃyuktaḥ sampūrṇaphalabhāj bhavet // Mn_1.109 //
GSD36manu2p_u:218: evam ācārato dṛṣṭvā dharmasya munayo gatiṃ /
GSD36manu2p_u:219: sarvasya tapaso mūlam ācāraṃ jagṛhuḥ param // Mn_1.110 //
GSD36manu2p_u:220: jagataś ca samutpattiṃ saṃskāravidhim eva ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:221: vratacaryopacāraṃ ca snānasya ca paraṃ vidhim // Mn_1.111 //
GSD36manu2p_u:223: mahāyajñavidhānaṃ ca śrāddhakalpaṃ ca śāśvatam // Mn_1.112 //
GSD36manu2p_u:224: vṛttīnāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ caiva snātakasya vratāni ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:225: bhakṣyābhakṣyaṃ ca śaucaṃ ca dravyāṇāṃ śuddhim eva ca // Mn_1.113 //
GSD36manu2p_u:226: strīdharmayogaṃ tāpasyaṃ mokṣaṃ saṃnyāsam eva ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:227: rājñaś ca dharmam akhilaṃ kāryāṇāṃ ca vinirṇayam // Mn_1.114 //
GSD36manu2p_u:229: vibhāgadharmaṃ dyūtaṃ ca kaṇṭakānāṃ ca śodhanam // Mn_1.115 //
GSD36manu2p_u:231: āpaddharmaṃ ca varṇānāṃ prāyaścittavidhiṃ tathā // Mn_1.116 //
GSD36manu2p_u:235: pāṣaṇḍagaṇadharmāṃś ca śāstre 'sminn uktavān manuḥ // Mn_1.118 //
GSD36manu2p_u:236: yathedam uktavāñ śāstraṃ purā pṛṣṭo manur mayā /
GSD36manu2p_u:237: tathedaṃ yūyam apy adya matsakāśān nibodhata // Mn_1.119 //
GSD36manu2p_u:239: hṛdayenābhyanujñāto yo dharmas taṃ nibodhata // Mn_2.1 //
GSD36manu2p_u:240: kāmātmatā na praśastā na caivehāsty akāmatā /
GSD36manu2p_u:241: kāmyo hi vedādhigamaḥ karmayogaś ca vaidikaḥ // Mn_2.2 //
GSD36manu2p_u:243: vratāni yamadharmāś ca sarve saṃkalpajāḥ smṛtāḥ // Mn_2.3 //
GSD36manu2p_u:244: akāmasya kriyā kā cid dṛśyate neha karhi cit /
GSD36manu2p_u:245: yad yad dhi kurute kiṃ cit tat tat kāmasya ceṣṭitam // Mn_2.4 //
GSD36manu2p_u:247: yathā saṃkalpitāṃś ceha sarvān kāmān samaśnute // Mn_2.5 //
GSD36manu2p_u:249: ācāraś caiva sādhūnām ātmanas tuṣṭir eva ca // Mn_2.6 //
GSD36manu2p_u:250: yaḥ kaś cit kasya cid dharmo manunā parikīrtitaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:251: sa sarvo 'bhihito vede sarvajñānamayo hi saḥ // Mn_2.7 //
GSD36manu2p_u:253: śrutiprāmāṇyato vidvān svadharme niviśeta vai // Mn_2.8 //
GSD36manu2p_u:255: iha kīrtim avāpnoti pretya cānuttamaṃ sukham // Mn_2.9 //
GSD36manu2p_u:256: śrutis tu vedo vijñeyo dharmaśāstraṃ tu vai smṛtiḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:257: te sarvārtheṣv amīmāṃsye tābhyāṃ dharmo hi nirbabhau // Mn_2.10 //
GSD36manu2p_u:259: sa sādhubhir bahiṣkāryo nāstiko vedanindakaḥ // Mn_2.11 //
GSD36manu2p_u:260: vedaḥ smṛtiḥ sadācāraḥ svasya ca priyam ātmanaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:261: etac caturvidhaṃ prāhuḥ sākṣād dharmasya lakṣaṇam // Mn_2.12 //
GSD36manu2p_u:263: dharmaṃ jijñāsamānānāṃ pramāṇaṃ paramaṃ śrutiḥ // Mn_2.13 //
GSD36manu2p_u:264: śrutidvaidhaṃ tu yatra syāt tatra dharmāv ubhau smṛtau /
GSD36manu2p_u:265: ubhāv api hi tau dharmau samyag uktau manīṣibhiḥ // Mn_2.14 //
GSD36manu2p_u:267: sarvathā vartate yajña itīyaṃ vaidikī śrutiḥ // Mn_2.15 //
GSD36manu2p_u:269: tasya śāstre 'dhikāro 'smiñ jñeyo nānyasya kasya cit // Mn_2.16 //
GSD36manu2p_u:271: taṃ devanirmitaṃ deśaṃ brahmāvartaṃ pracakṣate // Mn_2.17 //
GSD36manu2p_u:273: varṇānāṃ sāntarālānāṃ sa sadācāra ucyate // Mn_2.18 //
GSD36manu2p_u:274: kurukṣetraṃ ca matsyāś ca pañcālāḥ śūrasenakāḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:275: eṣa brahmarṣideśo vai brahmāvartād anantaraḥ // Mn_2.19 //
GSD36manu2p_u:277: svaṃ svaṃ caritraṃ śikṣeran pṛthivyāṃ sarvamānavāḥ // Mn_2.20 //
GSD36manu2p_u:278: himavadvindhyayor madhyaṃ yat prāg vinaśanād api /
GSD36manu2p_u:279: pratyag eva prayāgāc ca madhyadeśaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // Mn_2.21 //
GSD36manu2p_u:280: ā samudrāt tu vai pūrvād ā samudrāc ca paścimāt /
GSD36manu2p_u:281: tayor evāntaraṃ giryor āryāvartaṃ vidur budhāḥ // Mn_2.22 //
GSD36manu2p_u:282: kṛṣṇasāras tu carati mṛgo yatra svabhāvataḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:283: sa jñeyo yajñiyo deśo mlecchadeśas tv ataḥ paraḥ // Mn_2.23 //
GSD36manu2p_u:285: śūdras tu yasmin kasmin vā nivased vṛttikarśitaḥ // Mn_2.24 //
GSD36manu2p_u:286: eṣā dharmasya vo yoniḥ samāsena prakīrtitā /
GSD36manu2p_u:287: saṃbhavaś cāsya sarvasya varṇadharmān nibodhata // Mn_2.25 //
GSD36manu2p_u:289: kāryaḥ śarīrasaṃskāraḥ pāvanaḥ pretya ceha ca // Mn_2.26 //
GSD36manu2p_u:291: baijikaṃ gārbhikaṃ caino dvijānām apamṛjyate // Mn_2.27 //
GSD36manu2p_u:293: mahāyajñaiś ca yajñaiś ca brāhmīyaṃ kriyate tanuḥ // Mn_2.28 //
GSD36manu2p_u:296: nāmadheyaṃ daśamyāṃ tu dvādaśyāṃ vāsya kārayet /
GSD36manu2p_u:297: puṇye tithau muhūrte vā nakṣatre vā guṇānvite // Mn_2.30 //
GSD36manu2p_u:299: vaiśyasya dhanasaṃyuktaṃ śūdrasya tu jugupsitam // Mn_2.31 //
GSD36manu2p_u:304: caturthe māsi kartavyaṃ śiśor niṣkramaṇaṃ gṛhāt /
GSD36manu2p_u:305: ṣaṣṭhe 'nnaprāśanaṃ māsi yad veṣṭaṃ maṅgalaṃ kule // Mn_2.34 //
GSD36manu2p_u:307: prathame 'bde tṛtīye vā kartavyaṃ śruticodanāt // Mn_2.35 //
GSD36manu2p_u:309: garbhād ekādaśe rājño garbhāt tu dvādaśe viśaḥ // Mn_2.36 //
GSD36manu2p_u:313: ā dvāviṃśāt kṣatrabandhor ā caturviṃśater viśaḥ // Mn_2.38 //
GSD36manu2p_u:314: ata ūrdhvaṃ trayo 'py ete yathākālam asaṃskṛtāḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:316: naitair apūtair vidhivad āpady api hi karhi cit /
GSD36manu2p_u:317: brāhmān yaunāṃś ca saṃbandhān nācared brāhmaṇaḥ saha // Mn_2.40 //
GSD36manu2p_u:320: mauñjī trivṛt samā ślakṣṇā kāryā viprasya mekhalā /
GSD36manu2p_u:321: kṣatriyasya tu maurvī jyā vaiśyasya śaṇatāntavī // Mn_2.42 //
GSD36manu2p_u:323: trivṛtā granthinaikena tribhiḥ pañcabhir eva vā // Mn_2.43 //
GSD36manu2p_u:327: pailavāudumbarau vaiśyo daṇḍān arhanti dharmataḥ // Mn_2.45 //
GSD36manu2p_u:329: lalāṭasammito rājñaḥ syāt tu nāsāntiko viśaḥ // Mn_2.46 //
GSD36manu2p_u:330: ṛjavas te tu sarve syur avraṇāḥ saumyadarśanāḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:333: pradakṣiṇaṃ parītyāgniṃ cared bhaikṣaṃ yathāvidhi // Mn_2.48 //
GSD36manu2p_u:335: bhavanmadhyaṃ tu rājanyo vaiśyas tu bhavaduttaram // Mn_2.49 //
GSD36manu2p_u:336: mātaraṃ vā svasāraṃ vā mātur vā bhaginīṃ nijām /
GSD36manu2p_u:337: bhikṣeta bhikṣāṃ prathamaṃ yā cainaṃ nāvamānayet // Mn_2.50 //
GSD36manu2p_u:338: samāhṛtya tu tad bhaikṣaṃ yāvadannam amāyayā /
GSD36manu2p_u:339: nivedya gurave 'śnīyād ācamya prāṅmukhaḥ śuciḥ // Mn_2.51 //
GSD36manu2p_u:341: śriyaṃ pratyaṅmukho bhuṅkte ṛtaṃ bhuṅkte hy udaṅmukhaḥ // Mn_2.52 //
GSD36manu2p_u:342: upaspṛśya dvijo nityam annam adyāt samāhitaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:343: bhuktvā copaspṛśet samyag adbhiḥ khāni ca saṃspṛśet // Mn_2.53 //
GSD36manu2p_u:344: pūjayed aśanaṃ nityam adyāc caitad akutsayan /
GSD36manu2p_u:345: dṛṣṭvā hṛṣyet prasīdec ca pratinandec ca sarvaśaḥ // Mn_2.54 //
GSD36manu2p_u:346: pūjitaṃ hy aśanaṃ nityaṃ balam ūrjaṃ ca yacchati /
GSD36manu2p_u:347: apūjitaṃ tu tad bhuktam ubhayaṃ nāśayed idam // Mn_2.55 //
GSD36manu2p_u:348: nocchiṣṭaṃ kasya cid dadyān nādyād etat tathāntarā /
GSD36manu2p_u:349: na caivātyaśanaṃ kuryān na cocchiṣṭaḥ kva cid vrajet // Mn_2.56 //
GSD36manu2p_u:351: apuṇyaṃ lokavidviṣṭaṃ tasmāt tat parivarjayet // Mn_2.57 //
GSD36manu2p_u:353: kāyatraidaśikābhyāṃ vā na pitryeṇa kadā cana // Mn_2.58 //
GSD36manu2p_u:355: kāyam aṅgulimūle 'gre devaṃ pitryaṃ tayor adhaḥ // Mn_2.59 //
GSD36manu2p_u:356: trir ācāmed apaḥ pūrvaṃ dviḥ pramṛjyāt tato mukham /
GSD36manu2p_u:357: khāni caiva spṛśed adbhir ātmānaṃ śira eva ca // Mn_2.60 //
GSD36manu2p_u:360: hṛdgābhiḥ pūyate vipraḥ kaṇṭhagābhis tu bhūmipaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:361: vaiśyo 'dbhiḥ prāśitābhis tu śūdraḥ spṛṣṭābhir antataḥ // Mn_2.62 //
GSD36manu2p_u:362: uddhṛte dakṣine pāṇāv upavīty ucyate dvijaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:365: apsu prāsya vinaṣṭāni gṛhṇītānyāni mantravat // Mn_2.64 //
GSD36manu2p_u:367: rājanyabandhor dvāviṃśe vaiśyasya dvyadhike mataḥ // Mn_2.65 //
GSD36manu2p_u:368: amantrikā tu kāryeyaṃ strīṇām āvṛd aśeṣataḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:370: vaivāhiko vidhiḥ strīṇāṃ saṃskāro vaidikaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:374: upanīya guruḥ śiṣyaṃ śikṣayec chaucam āditaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:375: ācāram agnikāryaṃ ca saṃdhyopāsanam eva ca // Mn_2.69 //
GSD36manu2p_u:378: brahmārambhe 'vasāne ca pādau grāhyau guroḥ sadā /
GSD36manu2p_u:379: saṃhatya hastāv adhyeyaṃ sa hi brahmāñjaliḥ smṛtaḥ // Mn_2.71 //
GSD36manu2p_u:381: savyena savyaḥ spraṣṭavyo dakṣiṇena ca dakṣiṇaḥ // Mn_2.72 //
GSD36manu2p_u:383: adhīṣva bho iti brūyād virāmo 'stv iti cāramet // Mn_2.73 //
GSD36manu2p_u:384: brahmanaḥ praṇavaṃ kuryād ādāv ante ca sarvadā /
GSD36manu2p_u:385: sravaty anoṃkṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ parastāc ca viśīryati // Mn_2.74 //
GSD36manu2p_u:387: prāṇāyāmais tribhiḥ pūtas tata oṃkāram arhati // Mn_2.75 //
GSD36manu2p_u:388: akāraṃ cāpy ukāraṃ ca makāraṃ ca prajāpatiḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:389: vedatrayān niraduhad bhūr bhuvaḥ svar itīti ca // Mn_2.76 //
GSD36manu2p_u:390: tribhya eva tu vedebhyaḥ pādaṃ pādam adūduhat /
GSD36manu2p_u:391: tad ity ṛco 'syāḥ sāvitryāḥ parameṣṭhī prajāpatiḥ // Mn_2.77 //
GSD36manu2p_u:392: etad akṣaram etāṃ ca japan vyāhṛtipūrvikām /
GSD36manu2p_u:393: saṃdhyayor vedavid vipro vedapuṇyena yujyate // Mn_2.78 //
GSD36manu2p_u:394: sahasrakṛtvas tv abhyasya bahir etat trikaṃ dvijaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:395: mahato 'py enaso māsāt tvacevāhir vimucyate // Mn_2.79 //
GSD36manu2p_u:396: etayā rcā visaṃyuktaḥ kāle ca kriyayā svayā /
GSD36manu2p_u:399: tripadā caiva sāvitrī vijñeyaṃ brahmaṇo mukham // Mn_2.81 //
GSD36manu2p_u:400: yo 'dhīte 'hany ahany etāṃ trīṇi varṣāṇy atandritaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:401: sa brahma param abhyeti vāyubhūtaḥ khamūrtimān // Mn_2.82 //
GSD36manu2p_u:402: ekākṣaraṃ paraṃ brahma prāṇāyāmaḥ paraṃ tapaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:403: sāvitryās tu paraṃ nāsti maunāt satyaṃ viśiṣyate // Mn_2.83 //
GSD36manu2p_u:405: akṣaraṃ duṣkaraṃ jñeyaṃ brahma caiva prajāpatiḥ // Mn_2.84 //
GSD36manu2p_u:407: upāṃśuḥ syāc chataguṇaḥ sāhasro mānasaḥ smṛtaḥ // Mn_2.85 //
GSD36manu2p_u:409: sarve te japayajñasya kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm // Mn_2.86 //
GSD36manu2p_u:410: japyenaiva tu saṃsidhyed brāhmaṇo nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:411: kuryād anyan na vā kuryān maitro brāhmaṇa ucyate // Mn_2.87 //
GSD36manu2p_u:413: saṃyame yatnam ātiṣṭhed vidvān yanteva vājinām // Mn_2.88 //
GSD36manu2p_u:415: tāni samyak pravakṣyāmi yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ // Mn_2.89 //
GSD36manu2p_u:416: śrotraṃ tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā nāsikā caiva pañcamī /
GSD36manu2p_u:417: pāyūpasthaṃ hastapādaṃ vāk caiva daśamī smṛtā // Mn_2.90 //
GSD36manu2p_u:421: yasmin jite jitāv etau bhavataḥ pañcakau gaṇau // Mn_2.92 //
GSD36manu2p_u:423: saṃniyamya tu tāny eva tataḥ siddhiṃ nigacchati // Mn_2.93 //
GSD36manu2p_u:424: na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāmyati /
GSD36manu2p_u:426: yaś caitān prāpnuyāt sarvān yaś caitān kevalāṃs tyajet /
GSD36manu2p_u:429: viṣayeṣu prajuṣṭāni yathā jñānena nityaśaḥ // Mn_2.96 //
GSD36manu2p_u:430: vedās tyāgaś ca yajñāś ca niyamāś ca tapāṃsi ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:431: na vipraduṣṭabhāvasya siddhiṃ gacchati karhi cit // Mn_2.97 //
GSD36manu2p_u:432: śrutvā spṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca bhuktvā ghrātvā ca yo naraḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:433: na hṛṣyati glāyati vā sa vijñeyo jitendriyaḥ // Mn_2.98 //
GSD36manu2p_u:434: indriyāṇāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ yady ekaṃ kṣaratīndriyam /
GSD36manu2p_u:435: tenāsya kṣarati prajñā dṛteḥ pādād ivodakam // Mn_2.99 //
GSD36manu2p_u:436: vaśe kṛtvendriyagrāmaṃ saṃyamya ca manas tathā /
GSD36manu2p_u:437: sarvān saṃsādhayed arthān akṣiṇvan yogatas tanum // Mn_2.100 //
GSD36manu2p_u:438: pūrvāṃ saṃdhyāṃ japāṃs tiṣṭhet sāvitrīm ārkadarśanāt /
GSD36manu2p_u:439: paścimāṃ tu samāsīnaḥ samyag ṛkṣavibhāvanāt // Mn_2.101 //
GSD36manu2p_u:440: pūrvāṃ saṃdhyāṃ japaṃs tiṣṭhan naiśam eno vyapohati /
GSD36manu2p_u:441: paścimāṃ tu samāsīno malaṃ hanti divākṛtam // Mn_2.102 //
GSD36manu2p_u:442: na tiṣṭhati tu yaḥ pūrvāṃ nopāste yaś ca paścimām /
GSD36manu2p_u:443: sa śūdravad bahiṣkāryaḥ sarvasmād dvijakarmaṇaḥ // Mn_2.103 //
GSD36manu2p_u:444: apāṃ samīpe niyato naityakaṃ vidhim āsthitaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:445: sāvitrīm apy adhīyīta gatvāraṇyaṃ samāhitaḥ // Mn_2.104 //
GSD36manu2p_u:447: nānurodho 'sty anadhyāye homamantreṣu caiva hi // Mn_2.105 //
GSD36manu2p_u:448: naityake nāsty anadhyāyo brahmasattraṃ hi tat smṛtam /
GSD36manu2p_u:450: yaḥ svādhyāyam adhīte 'bdaṃ vidhinā niyataḥ śuciḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:451: tasya nityaṃ kṣaraty eṣa payo dadhi ghṛtaṃ madhu // Mn_2.107 //
GSD36manu2p_u:453: ā samāvartanāt kuryāt kṛtopanayano dvijaḥ // Mn_2.108 //
GSD36manu2p_u:455: āptaḥ śakto 'rthadaḥ sādhuḥ svo 'dhyāpyā daśa dharmataḥ // Mn_2.109 //
GSD36manu2p_u:456: nāpṛṣṭaḥ kasya cid brūyān na cānyāyena pṛcchataḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:457: jānann api hi medhāvī jaḍaval loka ācaret // Mn_2.110 //
GSD36manu2p_u:458: adharmeṇa ca yaḥ prāha yaś cādharmeṇa pṛcchati /
GSD36manu2p_u:459: tayor anyataraḥ praiti vidveṣaṃ vādhigacchati // Mn_2.111 //
GSD36manu2p_u:460: dharmārthau yatra na syātāṃ śuśrūṣā vāpi tadvidhā /
GSD36manu2p_u:461: tatra vidyā na vaptavyā śubhaṃ bījam ivoṣare // Mn_2.112 //
GSD36manu2p_u:463: āpady api hi ghorāyāṃ na tv enām iriṇe vapet // Mn_2.113 //
GSD36manu2p_u:464: vidyā brāhmaṇam etyāha śevadhis te 'smi rakṣa mām /
GSD36manu2p_u:465: asūyakāya māṃ mādās tathā syāṃ vīryavattamā // Mn_2.114 //
GSD36manu2p_u:466: yam eva tu śuciṃ vidyān niyatabrahmacāriṇam /
GSD36manu2p_u:467: tasmai māṃ brūhi viprāya nidhipāyāpramādine // Mn_2.115 //
GSD36manu2p_u:468: brahma yas tv ananujñātam adhīyānād avāpnuyāt /
GSD36manu2p_u:470: laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ vāpi tathādhyātmikam eva vā /
GSD36manu2p_u:471: ādadīta yato jñānaṃ taṃ pūrvam abhivādayet // Mn_2.117 //
GSD36manu2p_u:476: ūrdhvaṃ prāṇā hy utkrāmanti yūnaḥ sthavira āyati /
GSD36manu2p_u:479: catvāri tasya vardhante āyur dharmo yaśo balam // Mn_2.121 //
GSD36manu2p_u:481: asau nāmāham asmīti svaṃ nāma parikīrtayet // Mn_2.122 //
GSD36manu2p_u:482: nāmadheyasya ye ke cid abhivādaṃ na jānate /
GSD36manu2p_u:483: tān prājño 'ham iti brūyāt striyaḥ sarvās tathaiva ca // Mn_2.123 //
GSD36manu2p_u:485: nāmnāṃ svarūpabhāvo hi bhobhāva ṛṣibhiḥ smṛtaḥ // Mn_2.124 //
GSD36manu2p_u:487: akāraś cāsya nāmno 'nte vācyaḥ pūrvākṣaraḥ plutaḥ // Mn_2.125 //
GSD36manu2p_u:488: yo na vetty abhivādasya vipraḥ pratyabhivādanam /
GSD36manu2p_u:489: nābhivādyaḥ sa viduṣā yathā śūdras tathaiva saḥ // Mn_2.126 //
GSD36manu2p_u:491: vaiśyaṃ kṣemaṃ samāgamya śūdram ārogyam eva ca // Mn_2.127 //
GSD36manu2p_u:492: avācyo dīkṣito nāmnā yavīyān api yo bhavet /
GSD36manu2p_u:493: bhobhavatpūrvakaṃ tv enam abhibhāṣeta dharmavit // Mn_2.128 //
GSD36manu2p_u:494: parapatnī tu yā strī syād asaṃbandhā ca yonitaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:495: tāṃ brūyād bhavatīty evaṃ subhage bhaginīti ca // Mn_2.129 //
GSD36manu2p_u:496: mātulāṃś ca pitṛvyāṃś ca śvaśurān ṛtvijo gurūn /
GSD36manu2p_u:497: asāv aham iti brūyāt pratyutthāya yavīyasaḥ // Mn_2.130 //
GSD36manu2p_u:499: saṃpūjyā gurupatnīvat samās tā gurubhāryayā // Mn_2.131 //
GSD36manu2p_u:502: pitur bhaginyāṃ mātuś ca jyāyasyāṃ ca svasary api /
GSD36manu2p_u:503: mātṛvad vṛttim ātiṣṭhen mātā tābhyo garīyasī // Mn_2.133 //
GSD36manu2p_u:506: brāhmaṇaṃ daśavarṣaṃ tu śatavarṣaṃ tu bhūmipam /
GSD36manu2p_u:507: pitāputrau vijānīyād brāhmaṇas tu tayoḥ pitā // Mn_2.135 //
GSD36manu2p_u:508: vittaṃ bandhur vayaḥ karma vidyā bhavati pañcamī /
GSD36manu2p_u:509: etāni mānyasthānāni garīyo yad yad uttaram // Mn_2.136 //
GSD36manu2p_u:510: pañcānāṃ triṣu varṇeṣu bhūyāṃsi guṇavanti ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:511: yatra syuḥ so 'tra mānārhaḥ śūdro 'pi daśamīṃ gataḥ // Mn_2.137 //
GSD36manu2p_u:513: snātakasya ca rājñaś ca panthā deyo varasya ca // Mn_2.138 //
GSD36manu2p_u:516: upanīya tu yaḥ śiṣyaṃ vedam adhyāpayed dvijaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:517: sakalpaṃ sarahasyaṃ ca tam ācāryaṃ pracakṣate // Mn_2.140 //
GSD36manu2p_u:518: ekadeśaṃ tu vedasya vedāṅgāny api vā punaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:519: yo 'dhyāpayati vṛttyartham upādhyāyaḥ sa ucyate // Mn_2.141 //
GSD36manu2p_u:521: saṃbhāvayati cānnena sa vipro gurur ucyate // Mn_2.142 //
GSD36manu2p_u:523: yaḥ karoti vṛto yasya sa tasya rtvig ihocyate // Mn_2.143 //
GSD36manu2p_u:524: ya āvṛṇoty avitathaṃ brahmaṇā śravaṇāv ubhau /
GSD36manu2p_u:525: sa mātā sa pitā jñeyas taṃ na druhyet kadā cana // Mn_2.144 //
GSD36manu2p_u:527: sahasraṃ tu pitṝn mātā gauraveṇātiricyate // Mn_2.145 //
GSD36manu2p_u:529: brahmajanma hi viprasya pretya ceha ca śāśvatam // Mn_2.146 //
GSD36manu2p_u:530: kāmān mātā pitā cainaṃ yad utpādayato mithaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:531: saṃbhūtiṃ tasya tāṃ vidyād yad yonāv abhijāyate // Mn_2.147 //
GSD36manu2p_u:532: ācāryas tv asya yāṃ jātiṃ vidhivad vedapāragaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:533: utpādayati sāvitryā sā satyā sājarāmarā // Mn_2.148 //
GSD36manu2p_u:534: alpaṃ vā bahu vā yasya śrutasyopakaroti yaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:535: tam apīha guruṃ vidyāc chrutopakriyayā tayā // Mn_2.149 //
GSD36manu2p_u:536: brāhmasya janmanaḥ kartā svadharmasya ca śāsitā /
GSD36manu2p_u:537: bālo 'pi vipro vṛddhasya pitā bhavati dharmataḥ // Mn_2.150 //
GSD36manu2p_u:538: adhyāpayām āsa pitṝn śiśur āṅgirasaḥ kaviḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:539: putrakā iti hovāca jñānena parigṛhya tān // Mn_2.151 //
GSD36manu2p_u:540: te tam artham apṛcchanta devān āgatamanyavaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:541: devāś caitān sametyocur nyāyyaṃ vaḥ śiśur uktavān // Mn_2.152 //
GSD36manu2p_u:542: ajño bhavati vai bālaḥ pitā bhavati mantradaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:543: ajñaṃ hi bālam ity āhuḥ pitety eva tu mantradam // Mn_2.153 //
GSD36manu2p_u:544: na hāyanair na palitair na vittena na bandhubhiḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:545: ṛṣayaś cakrire dharmaṃ yo 'nūcānaḥ sa no mahān // Mn_2.154 //
GSD36manu2p_u:546: viprāṇāṃ jñānato jyaiṣṭhyaṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ tu vīryataḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:547: vaiśyānāṃ dhānyadhanataḥ śūdrāṇām eva janmataḥ // Mn_2.155 //
GSD36manu2p_u:548: na tena vṛddho bhavati yenāsya palitaṃ śiraḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:549: yo vai yuvāpy adhīyānas taṃ devāḥ sthaviraṃ viduḥ // Mn_2.156 //
GSD36manu2p_u:550: yathā kāṣṭhamayo hastī yathā carmamayo mṛgaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:551: yaś ca vipro 'nadhīyānas trayas te nāma bibhrati // Mn_2.157 //
GSD36manu2p_u:552: yathā ṣaṇḍho 'phalaḥ strīṣu yathā gaur gavi cāphalā /
GSD36manu2p_u:553: yathā cājñe 'phalaṃ dānaṃ tathā vipro 'nṛco 'phalaḥ // Mn_2.158 //
GSD36manu2p_u:555: vāk caiva madhurā ślakṣṇā prayojyā dharmam icchatā // Mn_2.159 //
GSD36manu2p_u:556: yasya vāṅganasī śuddhe samyaggupte ca sarvadā /
GSD36manu2p_u:557: sa vai sarvam avāpnoti vedāntopagataṃ phalam // Mn_2.160 //
GSD36manu2p_u:559: yayāsyodvijate vācā nālokyāṃ tām udīrayet // Mn_2.161 //
GSD36manu2p_u:560: sammānād brāhmaṇo nityam udvijeta viṣād iva /
GSD36manu2p_u:562: sukhaṃ hy avamataḥ śete sukhaṃ ca pratibudhyate /
GSD36manu2p_u:563: sukhaṃ carati loke 'sminn avamantā vinaśyati // Mn_2.163 //
GSD36manu2p_u:565: gurau vasan sañcinuyād brahmādhigamikaṃ tapaḥ // Mn_2.164 //
GSD36manu2p_u:568: vedam eva sadābhyasyet tapas tapsyan dvijottamaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:569: vedābhyāso hi viprasya tapaḥ param ihocyate // Mn_2.166 //
GSD36manu2p_u:570: ā haiva sa nakhāgrebhyaḥ paramaṃ tapyate tapaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:571: yaḥ sragvy api dvijo 'dhīte svādhyāyaṃ śaktito 'nvaham // Mn_2.167 //
GSD36manu2p_u:572: yo 'nadhītya dvijo vedam anyatra kurute śramam /
GSD36manu2p_u:573: sa jīvann eva śūdratvam āśu gacchati sānvayaḥ // Mn_2.168 //
GSD36manu2p_u:577: tatrāsya mātā sāvitrī pitā tv ācārya ucyate // Mn_2.170 //
GSD36manu2p_u:579: na hy asmin yujyate karma kiñ cid ā mauñjibandhanāt // Mn_2.171 //
GSD36manu2p_u:581: śūdreṇa hi samas tāvad yāvad vede na jāyate // Mn_2.172 //
GSD36manu2p_u:583: brahmaṇo grahaṇaṃ caiva krameṇa vidhipūrvakam // Mn_2.173 //
GSD36manu2p_u:584: yady asya vihitaṃ carma yat sūtraṃ yā ca mekhalā /
GSD36manu2p_u:585: yo daṇḍo yac ca vasanaṃ tat tad asya vrateṣv api // Mn_2.174 //
GSD36manu2p_u:586: sevetemāṃs tu niyamān brahmacārī gurau vasan /
GSD36manu2p_u:589: devatābhyarcanaṃ caiva samidādhānam eva ca // Mn_2.176 //
GSD36manu2p_u:590: varjayen madhu māṃsaṃ ca gandhaṃ mālyaṃ rasān striyaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:591: śuktāni yāni sarvāṇi prāṇināṃ caiva hiṃsanam // Mn_2.177 //
GSD36manu2p_u:593: kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca nartanaṃ gītavādanam // Mn_2.178 //
GSD36manu2p_u:594: dyūtaṃ ca janavādaṃ ca parivādaṃ tathānṛtam /
GSD36manu2p_u:595: strīṇāṃ ca prekṣaṇālambham upaghātaṃ parasya ca // Mn_2.179 //
GSD36manu2p_u:596: ekaḥ śayīta sarvatra na retaḥ skandayet kva cit /
GSD36manu2p_u:597: kāmād dhi skandayan reto hinasti vratam ātmanaḥ // Mn_2.180 //
GSD36manu2p_u:598: svapne siktvā brahmacārī dvijaḥ śukram akāmataḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:599: snātvārkam arcayitvā triḥ punar mām ity ṛcaṃ japet // Mn_2.181 //
GSD36manu2p_u:601: āhared yāvad arthāni bhaikṣaṃ cāharahaś caret // Mn_2.182 //
GSD36manu2p_u:603: brahmacāry āhared bhaikṣaṃ gṛhebhyaḥ prayato 'nvaham // Mn_2.183 //
GSD36manu2p_u:604: guroḥ kule na bhikṣeta na jñātikulabandhuṣu /
GSD36manu2p_u:605: alābhe tv anyagehānāṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ vivarjayet // Mn_2.184 //
GSD36manu2p_u:606: sarvaṃ vāpi cared grāmaṃ pūrvoktānām asaṃbhave /
GSD36manu2p_u:607: niyamya prayato vācam abhiśastāṃs tu varjayet // Mn_2.185 //
GSD36manu2p_u:609: sāyaM: prātaś ca juhuyāt tābhir agnim atandritaḥ // Mn_2.186 //
GSD36manu2p_u:612: bhaikṣeṇa vartayen nityaṃ naikānnādī bhaved vratī /
GSD36manu2p_u:613: bhaikṣeṇa vratino vṛttir upavāsasamā smṛtā // Mn_2.188 //
GSD36manu2p_u:614: vratavad devadaivatye pitrye karmaṇy atha rṣivat /
GSD36manu2p_u:615: kāmam abhyarthito 'śnīyād vratam asya na lupyate // Mn_2.189 //
GSD36manu2p_u:617: rājanyavaiśyayos tv evaṃ naitat karma vidhīyate // Mn_2.190 //
GSD36manu2p_u:618: codito guruṇā nityam apracodita eva vā /
GSD36manu2p_u:619: kuryād adhyayane yatnam ācāryasya hiteṣu ca // Mn_2.191 //
GSD36manu2p_u:620: śarīraṃ caiva vācaṃ ca buddhīndriyamanāṃsi ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:621: niyamya prāñjalis tiṣṭhed vīkṣamāṇo guror mukham // Mn_2.192 //
GSD36manu2p_u:623: āsyatām iti coktaḥ sann āsītābhimukhaṃ guroḥ // Mn_2.193 //
GSD36manu2p_u:625: uttiṣṭhet prathamaṃ cāsya caramaṃ caiva saṃviśet // Mn_2.194 //
GSD36manu2p_u:627: nāsīno na ca bhuñjāno na tiṣṭhan na parāṅmukhaḥ // Mn_2.195 //
GSD36manu2p_u:628: āsīnasya sthitaḥ kuryād abhigacchaṃs tu tiṣṭhataḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:629: pratyudgamya tv āvrajataḥ paścād dhāvaṃs tu dhāvataḥ // Mn_2.196 //
GSD36manu2p_u:631: praṇamya tu śayānasya nideśe caiva tiṣṭhataḥ // Mn_2.197 //
GSD36manu2p_u:632: nīcaṃ śayyāsanaṃ cāsya nityaṃ syād gurusannidhau /
GSD36manu2p_u:633: guros tu cakṣurviṣaye na yatheṣṭāsano bhavet // Mn_2.198 //
GSD36manu2p_u:634: nodāhared asya nāma parokṣam api kevalam /
GSD36manu2p_u:636: guror yatra parivādo nindā vāpi pravartate /
GSD36manu2p_u:637: karṇau tatra pidhātavyau gantavyaṃ vā tato 'nyataḥ // Mn_2.200 //
GSD36manu2p_u:638: parīvādāt kharo bhavati śvā vai bhavati nindakaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:639: paribhoktā kṛmir bhavati kīṭo bhavati matsarī // Mn_2.201 //
GSD36manu2p_u:640: dūrastho nārcayed enaṃ na kruddho nāntike striyāḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:643: asaṃśrave caiva guror na kiṃ cid api kīrtayet // Mn_2.203 //
GSD36manu2p_u:645: āsīta guruṇā sārdhaṃ śilāphalakanauṣu ca // Mn_2.204 //
GSD36manu2p_u:646: guror gurau sannihite guruvad vṛttim ācaret /
GSD36manu2p_u:647: na cānisṛṣṭo guruṇā svān gurūn abhivādayet // Mn_2.205 //
GSD36manu2p_u:648: vidyāguruṣv evam eva nityā vṛttiḥ svayoniṣu /
GSD36manu2p_u:649: pratiṣedhatsu cādharmād dhitaṃ copadiśatsv api // Mn_2.206 //
GSD36manu2p_u:650: śreyaḥsu guruvad vṛttiṃ nityam eva samācaret /
GSD36manu2p_u:651: guruputreṣu cāryeṣu guroś caiva svabandhuṣu // Mn_2.207 //
GSD36manu2p_u:652: bālaḥ samānajanmā vā śiṣyo vā yajñakarmaṇi /
GSD36manu2p_u:653: adhyāpayan gurusuto guruvan mānam arhati // Mn_2.208 //
GSD36manu2p_u:655: na kuryād guruputrasya pādayoś cāvanejanam // Mn_2.209 //
GSD36manu2p_u:658: abhyañjanaṃ snāpanaṃ ca gātrotsādanam eva ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:659: gurupatnyā na kāryāṇi keśānāṃ ca prasādhanam // Mn_2.211 //
GSD36manu2p_u:662: svabhāva eṣa nārīṇāṃ narāṇām iha dūṣaṇam /
GSD36manu2p_u:663: ato 'rthān na pramādyanti pramadāsu vipaścitaḥ // Mn_2.213 //
GSD36manu2p_u:664: avidvāṃsam alaṃ loke vidvāṃsam api vā punaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:665: pramadā hy utpathaṃ netuṃ kāmakrodhavaśānugam // Mn_2.214 //
GSD36manu2p_u:666: mātrā svasrā duhitrā vā na viviktāsano bhavet /
GSD36manu2p_u:667: balavān indriyagrāmo vidvāṃsam api karṣati // Mn_2.215 //
GSD36manu2p_u:668: kāmaṃ tu gurupatnīnāṃ yuvatīnāṃ yuvā bhuvi /
GSD36manu2p_u:669: vidhivad vandanaṃ kuryād asāv aham iti bruvan // Mn_2.216 //
GSD36manu2p_u:671: gurudāreṣu kurvīta satāṃ dharmam anusmaran // Mn_2.217 //
GSD36manu2p_u:672: yathā khanan khanitreṇa naro vāry adhigacchati /
GSD36manu2p_u:673: tathā gurugatāṃ vidyāṃ śuśrūṣur adhigacchati // Mn_2.218 //
GSD36manu2p_u:674: muṇḍo vā jaṭilo vā syād atha vā syāc chikhājaṭaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:675: nainaṃ grāme 'bhinimlocet sūryo nābhyudiyāt kva cit // Mn_2.219 //
GSD36manu2p_u:676: taṃ ced abhyudiyāt sūryaḥ śayānaṃ kāmacārataḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:677: nimloced vāpy avijñānāj japann upavased dinam // Mn_2.220 //
GSD36manu2p_u:678: sūryeṇa hy abhinirmuktaḥ śayāno 'bhyuditaś ca yaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:679: prāyaścittam akurvāṇo yuktaḥ syān mahatainasā // Mn_2.221 //
GSD36manu2p_u:680: ācamya prayato nityam ubhe saṃdhye samāhitaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:681: śucau deśe japañ japyam upāsīta yathāvidhi // Mn_2.222 //
GSD36manu2p_u:682: yadi strī yady avarajaḥ śreyaḥ kiṃ cit samācaret /
GSD36manu2p_u:683: tat sarvam ācared yukto yatra cāsya ramen manaḥ // Mn_2.223 //
GSD36manu2p_u:684: dharmārthāv ucyate śreyaḥ kāmārthau dharma eva ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:685: artha eveha vā śreyas trivarga iti tu sthitiḥ // Mn_2.224 //
GSD36manu2p_u:686: ācāryaś ca pitā caiva mātā bhrātā ca pūrvajaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:688: ācāryo brahmaṇo mūrtiḥ pitā mūrtiḥ prajāpateḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:689: mātā pṛthivyā mūrtis tu bhrātā svo mūrtir ātmanaḥ // Mn_2.226 //
GSD36manu2p_u:690: yaṃ mātāpitarau kleśaṃ sahete saṃbhave nṛṇām /
GSD36manu2p_u:691: na tasya niṣkṛtiḥ śakyā kartuṃ varṣaśatair api // Mn_2.227 //
GSD36manu2p_u:692: tayor nityaṃ priyaṃ kuryād ācāryasya ca sarvadā /
GSD36manu2p_u:693: teṣv eva triṣu tuṣṭeṣu tapaḥ sarvaṃ samāpyate // Mn_2.228 //
GSD36manu2p_u:694: teṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ śuśrūṣā paramaṃ tapa ucyate /
GSD36manu2p_u:695: na tair anabhyanujñāto dharmam anyaṃ samācaret // Mn_2.229 //
GSD36manu2p_u:696: ta eva hi trayo lokās ta eva traya āśramāḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:697: ta eva hi trayo vedās ta evoktās trayo 'gnayaḥ // Mn_2.230 //
GSD36manu2p_u:698: pitā vai gārhapatyo 'gnir mātāgnir dakṣiṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:699: gurur āhavanīyas tu sāgnitretā garīyasī // Mn_2.231 //
GSD36manu2p_u:700: triṣv apramādyann eteṣu trīn lokān vijayed gṛhī /
GSD36manu2p_u:701: dīpyamānaḥ svavapuṣā devavad divi modate // Mn_2.232 //
GSD36manu2p_u:702: imaṃ lokaṃ mātṛbhaktyā pitṛbhaktyā tu madhyamam /
GSD36manu2p_u:703: guruśuśrūṣayā tv evaṃ brahmalokaṃ samaśnute // Mn_2.233 //
GSD36manu2p_u:704: sarve tasyādṛtā dharmā yasyaite traya ādṛtāḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:705: anādṛtās tu yasyaite sarvās tasyāphalāḥ kriyāḥ // Mn_2.234 //
GSD36manu2p_u:706: yāvat trayas te jīveyus tāvan nānyaṃ samācaret /
GSD36manu2p_u:707: teṣv eva nityaṃ śuśrūṣāṃ kuryāt priyahite rataḥ // Mn_2.235 //
GSD36manu2p_u:708: teṣām anuparodhena pāratryaṃ yad yad ācaret /
GSD36manu2p_u:709: tat tan nivedayet tebhyo manovacanakarmabhiḥ // Mn_2.236 //
GSD36manu2p_u:710: triṣv eteṣv itikṛtyaṃ hi puruṣasya samāpyate /
GSD36manu2p_u:711: eṣa dharmaḥ paraḥ sākṣād upadharmo 'nya ucyate // Mn_2.237 //
GSD36manu2p_u:713: anyād api paraṃ dharmaṃ strīratnaṃ duṣkulād api // Mn_2.238 //
GSD36manu2p_u:714: viṣād apy amṛtaṃ grāhyaṃ bālād api subhāṣitam /
GSD36manu2p_u:715: amitrād api sadvṛttam amedhyād api kāñcanam // Mn_2.239 //
GSD36manu2p_u:716: striyo ratnāny atho vidyā dharmaḥ śaucaṃ subhāṣitam /
GSD36manu2p_u:717: vividhāni ca śīlpāni samādeyāni sarvataḥ // Mn_2.240 //
GSD36manu2p_u:719: anuvrajyā ca śuśrūṣā yāvad adhyāyanaṃ guroḥ // Mn_2.241 //
GSD36manu2p_u:720: nābrāhmaṇe gurau śiṣyo vāsam ātyantikaṃ vaset /
GSD36manu2p_u:721: brāhmaṇe vānanūcāne kāṅkṣan gatim anuttamām // Mn_2.242 //
GSD36manu2p_u:722: yadi tv ātyantikaṃ vāsaṃ rocayeta guroḥ kule /
GSD36manu2p_u:723: yuktaḥ paricared enam ā śarīravimokṣaṇāt // Mn_2.243 //
GSD36manu2p_u:724: ā samāpteḥ śarīrasya yas tu śuśrūṣate gurum /
GSD36manu2p_u:725: sa gacchaty añjasā vipro brahmaṇaḥ sadma śāśvatam // Mn_2.244 //
GSD36manu2p_u:726: na pūrvaṃ gurave kiṃ cid upakurvīta dharmavit /
GSD36manu2p_u:727: snāsyaṃs tu guruṇājñaptaḥ śaktyā gurvartham āharet // Mn_2.245 //
GSD36manu2p_u:728: kṣetraṃ hiraṇyaṃ gām aśvaṃ chatropānaham āsanam /
GSD36manu2p_u:729: dhānyaṃ śākaṃ ca vāsāṃsi gurave prītim āvahet // Mn_2.246 //
GSD36manu2p_u:730: ācārye tu khalu prete guruputre guṇānvite /
GSD36manu2p_u:731: gurudāre sapiṇḍe vā guruvad vṛttim ācaret // Mn_2.247 //
GSD36manu2p_u:734: evaṃ carati yo vipro brahmacaryam aviplutaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:735: sa gacchaty uttamasthānaṃ na ceha jāyate punaḥ // Mn_2.249 //
GSD36manu2p_u:737: tadardhikaṃ pādikaṃ vā grahaṇāntikam eva vā // Mn_3.1 //

GSD36manu2p_u:2155: sā bhartṛlokam āpnoti sadbhiḥ sādhvīti cocyate // Mn_5.165[163M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2157: ihāgryāṃ kīrtim āpnoti patilokaṃ paratra ca // Mn_5.166[164M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2158: evaṃ vṛttāṃ savarṇāṃ strīṃ dvijātiḥ pūrvamāriṇīm /
GSD36manu2p_u:2159: dāhayed agnihotreṇa yajñapātraiś ca dharmavit // Mn_5.167[165M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2161: punar dārakriyāṃ kuryāt punar ādhānam eva ca // Mn_5.168[166M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2162: anena vidhinā nityaṃ pañcayajñān na hāpayet /
GSD36manu2p_u:2163: dvitīyam āyuṣo bhāgaṃ kṛtadāro gṛhe vaset // Mn_5.169[167M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2164: evaṃ gṛhāśrame sthitvā vidhivat snātako dvijaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2165: vane vaset tu niyato yathāvad vijitendriyaḥ // Mn_6.1 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2166: gṛhasthas tu yathā paśyed valīpalitam ātmanaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2168: saṃtyajya grāmyam āhāraṃ sarvaṃ caiva paricchadam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2169: putreṣu bhāryāṃ nikṣipya vanaṃ gacchet sahaiva vā // Mn_6.3 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2171: grāmād araṇyaṃ niḥsṛtya nivasen niyatendriyaḥ // Mn_6.4 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2173: etān eva mahāyajñān nirvaped vidhipūrvakam // Mn_6.5 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2174: vasīta carma cīraṃ vā sāyaṃ snāyāt prage tathā /
GSD36manu2p_u:2175: jaṭāś ca bibhṛyān nityaṃ śmaśrulomanakhāni ca // Mn_6.6 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2176: yadbhakṣyaṃ syād tato dadyād baliṃ bhikṣāṃ ca śaktitaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2178: svādhyāye nityayuktaḥ syād dānto maitraḥ samāhitaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2181: darśam askandayan parva paurṇamāsaṃ ca yogataḥ // Mn_6.9 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2183: turāyaṇaṃ ca kramaśo dakṣasyāyanam eva ca // Mn_6.10 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2185: puroḍāśāṃś carūṃś caiva vidhivan nirvapet pṛthak // Mn_6.11 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2186: devatābhyas tu tad dhutvā vanyaṃ medhyataraṃ haviḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2187: śeṣam ātmani yuñjīta lavaṇaṃ ca svayaṃ kṛtam // Mn_6.12 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2189: medhyavṛkṣodbhavāny adyāt snehāṃś ca phalasaṃbhavān // Mn_6.13 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2190: varjayen madhu māṃsaṃ ca bhaumāni kavakāni ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:2191: bhūstṛṇaṃ śigrukaṃ caiva śleśmātakaphalāni ca // Mn_6.14 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2193: jīrṇāni caiva vāsāṃsi śākamūlaphalāni ca // Mn_6.15 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2194: na phālakṛṣṭam aśnīyād utsṛṣṭam api kena cit /
GSD36manu2p_u:2195: na grāmajātāny ārto 'pi mūlāṇi ca phalāni ca // Mn_6.16 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2196: agnipakvāśano vā syāt kālapakvabhug eva vā /
GSD36manu2p_u:2197: aśmakuṭṭo bhaved vāpi dantolūkhaliko 'pi vā // Mn_6.17 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2198: sadyaḥ prakṣālako vā syān māsasaṃcayiko 'pi vā /
GSD36manu2p_u:2199: ṣaṇmāsanicayo vā syāt samānicaya eva vā // Mn_6.18 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2200: naktaṃ cānnaṃ samaśnīyād divā vāhṛtya śaktitaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2201: caturthakāliko vā syāt syād vāpy aṣṭamakālikaḥ // Mn_6.19 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2203: pakṣāntayor vāpy aśnīyād yavāgūṃ kvathitāṃ sakṛt // Mn_6.20 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2205: kālapakvaiḥ svayaṃ śīrṇair vaikhānasamate sthitaḥ // Mn_6.21 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2206: bhūmau viparivarteta tiṣṭhed vā prapadair dinam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2208: grīṣme pañcatapās tu syād varṣāsv abhrāvakāśikaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2209: ārdravāsās tu hemante kramaśo vardhayaṃs tapaḥ // Mn_6.23 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2210: upaspṛśaṃs triṣavaṇaṃ pitṝn devāṃś ca tarpayet /
GSD36manu2p_u:2211: tapaś caraṃś cogrataraṃ śoṣayed deham ātmanaḥ // Mn_6.24 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2213: anagnir aniketaḥ syān munir mūlaphalāśanaḥ // Mn_6.25 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2216: tāpaseṣv eva vipreṣu yātrikaṃ bhaikṣam āharet /
GSD36manu2p_u:2218: grāmād āhṛtya vāśnīyād aṣṭau grāsān vane vasan /
GSD36manu2p_u:2219: pratigṛhya puṭenaiva pāṇinā śakalena vā // Mn_6.28 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2220: etāś cānyāś ca seveta dīkṣā vipro vane vasan /
GSD36manu2p_u:2222: ṛṣibhir brāhmaṇaiś caiva gṛhasthair eva sevitāḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2225: ā nipātāc charīrasya yukto vāryanilāśanaḥ // Mn_6.31 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2228: vaneṣu ca vihṛtyaivaṃ tṛtīyaṃ bhāgam āyuṣaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2229: caturtham āyuṣo bhāgaṃ tyakvā saṅgān parivrajet // Mn_6.33 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2232: ṛṇāni trīṇy apākṛtya mano mokṣe niveśayet /
GSD36manu2p_u:2233: anapākṛtya mokṣaṃ tu sevamāno vrajaty adhaḥ // Mn_6.35 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2234: adhītya vidhivad vedān putrāṃś cotpādya dharmataḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2235: iṣṭvā ca śaktito yajñair mano mokṣe niveśayet // Mn_6.36 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2236: anadhītya dvijo vedān anutpādya tathā sutān /
GSD36manu2p_u:2237: aniṣṭvā caiva yajñaiś ca mokṣam icchan vrajaty adhaḥ // Mn_6.37 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2239: ātmany agnīn samāropya brāhmaṇaḥ pravrajed gṛhāt // Mn_6.38 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2240: yo dattvā sarvabhūtebhyaḥ pravrajaty abhayaṃ gṛhāt /
GSD36manu2p_u:2241: tasya tejomayā lokā bhavanti brahmavādinaḥ // Mn_6.39 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2242: yasmād aṇv api bhūtānāṃ dvijān notpadyate bhayam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2243: tasya dehād vimuktasya bhayaṃ nāsti kutaś cana // Mn_6.40 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2246: eka eva caren nityaṃ siddhyartham asahāyavān /
GSD36manu2p_u:2247: siddhim ekasya saṃpaśyan na jahāti na hīyate // Mn_6.42 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2248: anagnir aniketaḥ syād grāmam annārtham āśrayet /
GSD36manu2p_u:2251: samatā caiva sarvasminn etan muktasya lakṣaṇam // Mn_6.44 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2253: kālam eva pratīkṣeta nirveśaṃ bhṛtako yathā // Mn_6.45 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2254: dṛṣṭipūtaṃ nyaset pādaṃ vastrapūtaṃ jalaṃ pibet /
GSD36manu2p_u:2255: satyapūtāṃ vaded vācaṃ manaḥpūtaṃ samācaret // Mn_6.46 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2257: na cemaṃ deham āśritya vairaṃ kurvīta kena cit // Mn_6.47 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2258: kruddhyantaṃ na pratikrudhyed ākruṣṭaḥ kuśalaṃ vadet /
GSD36manu2p_u:2259: saptadvārāvakīrṇāṃ ca na vācam anṛtāṃ vadet // Mn_6.48 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2261: ātmanaiva sahāyena sukhārthī vicared iha // Mn_6.49 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2263: nānuśāsanavādābhyāṃ bhikṣāṃ lipseta karhi cit // Mn_6.50 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2264: na tāpasair brāhmaṇair vā vayobhir api vā śvabhiḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2265: ākīrṇaṃ bhikṣukair vānyair agāram upasaṃvrajet // Mn_6.51 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2267: vicaren niyato nityaṃ sarvabhūtāny apīḍayan // Mn_6.52 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2268: ataijasāni pātrāṇi tasya syur nirvraṇāni ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:2269: teṣām adbhiḥ smṛtaṃ śaucaṃ camasānām ivādhvare // Mn_6.53 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2270: alābuṃ dārupātraṃ ca mṛṇmayaṃ vaidalaṃ tathā /
GSD36manu2p_u:2272: ekakālaṃ cared bhaikṣaṃ na prasajjeta vistare /
GSD36manu2p_u:2273: bhaikṣe prasakto hi yatir viṣayeṣv api sajjati // Mn_6.55 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2275: vṛtte śarāvasaṃpāte bhikṣāṃ nityaṃ yatiś caret // Mn_6.56 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2276: alābhe na viṣadī syāl lābhe caiva na harṣayet /
GSD36manu2p_u:2279: abhipūjitalābhaiś ca yatir mukto 'pi badhyate // Mn_6.58 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2283: ahiṃsayā ca bhūtānām amṛtatvāya kalpate // Mn_6.60 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2285: niraye caiva patanaṃ yātanāś ca yamakṣaye // Mn_6.61 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2286: viprayogaṃ priyaiś caiva saṃyogaṃ ca tathāpriyaiḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2288: dehād utkramaṇaṃ cāṣmāt punar garbhe ca saṃbhavam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2293: deheṣu ca samutpattim uttameṣv adhameṣu ca // Mn_6.65 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2294: dūṣito 'pi cared dharmaṃ yatra tatrāśrame rataḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2295: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu na liṅgaṃ dharmakāraṇam // Mn_6.66 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2297: na nāmagrahaṇād eva tasya vāri prasīdati // Mn_6.67 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2298: saṃrakṣaṇārthaṃ jantūnāṃ rātrāv ahani vā sadā /
GSD36manu2p_u:2299: śarīrasyātyaye caiva samīkṣya vasudhāṃ caret // Mn_6.68 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2300: ahnā rātryā ca yāñ jantūn hinasty ajñānato yatiḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2301: teṣāṃ snātvā viśuddhyarthaṃ prāṇāyāmān ṣaḍ ācaret // Mn_6.69 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2303: vyāhṛtipraṇavair yuktā vijñeyaṃ paramaṃ tapaḥ // Mn_6.70 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2304: dahyante dhmāyamānānāṃ dhātūnāṃ hi yathā malāḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2305: tathendriyāṇāṃ dahyante doṣāḥ prāṇasya nigrahāt // Mn_6.71 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2306: prāṇāyamair dahed doṣān dhāraṇābhiś ca kilbiṣam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2311: darśanena vihīnas tu saṃsāraṃ pratipadyate // Mn_6.74 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2313: tapasaś caraṇaiś cograiḥ sādhayantīha tatpadam // Mn_6.75 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2317: rajasvalam anityaṃ ca bhūtāvāsam imaṃ tyajet // Mn_6.77 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2318: nadīkūlaṃ yathā vṛkṣo vṛkṣaṃ vā śakunir yathā /
GSD36manu2p_u:2319: tathā tyajann imaṃ dehaṃ kṛcchrād grāhād vimucyate // Mn_6.78 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2320: priyeṣu sveṣu sukṛtam apriyeṣu ca duṣkṛtam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2323: tadā sukham avāpnoti pretya ceha ca śāśvatam // Mn_6.80 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2324: anena vidhinā sarvāṃs tyaktvā saṅgāñ śanaiḥ śanaiḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2326: dhyānikaṃ sarvam evaitad yad etad abhiśabditam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2327: na hy anadhyātmavit kaś cit kriyāphalam upāśnute // Mn_6.82 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2328: adhiyajñaṃ brahma japed ādhidaivikam eva ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:2329: ādhyātmikaṃ ca satataṃ vedāntābhihitaṃ ca yat // Mn_6.83 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2330: idaṃ śaraṇam ajñānām idam eva vijānatām /
GSD36manu2p_u:2331: idam anvicchatāṃ svargam idam ānantyam icchatām // Mn_6.84 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2333: sa vidhūyeha pāpmānaṃ paraṃ brahmādhigacchati // Mn_6.85 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2336: brahmacārī gṛhasthaś ca vānaprastho yatis tathā /
GSD36manu2p_u:2337: ete gṛhasthaprabhavāś catvāraḥ pṛthag āśramāḥ // Mn_6.87 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2338: sarve 'pi kramaśas tv ete yathāśāstraṃ niṣevitāḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2339: yathoktakāriṇaṃ vipraṃ nayanti paramāṃ gatim // Mn_6.88 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2341: gṛhastha ucyate śreṣṭhaḥ sa trīn etān bibharti hi // Mn_6.89 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2342: yathā nadīnadāḥ sarve sāgare yānti saṃsthitim /
GSD36manu2p_u:2343: tathaivāśramiṇaḥ sarve gṛhasthe yānti saṃsthitim // Mn_6.90 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2344: caturbhir api caivaitair nityam āśramibhir dvijaiḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2347: dhīr vidyā satyam akrodho daśakaṃ dharmalakṣaṇam // Mn_6.92 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2348: daśa lakṣaṇāni dharmasya ye viprāḥ samadhīyate /
GSD36manu2p_u:2349: adhītya cānuvartante te yānti paramāṃ gatim // Mn_6.93 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2351: vedāntaṃ vidhivac chrutvā saṃnyased anṛṇo dvijaḥ // Mn_6.94 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2353: niyato vedam abhyasya putraiśvarye sukhaṃ vaset // Mn_6.95 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2357: puṇyo 'kṣayaphalaḥ pretya rājñāṃ dharmaṃ nibodhata // Mn_6.97 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2359: saṃbhavaś ca yathā tasya siddhiś ca paramā yathā // Mn_7.1 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2362: arājake hi loke 'smin sarvato vidruto bhayāt /
GSD36manu2p_u:2363: rakṣārtham asya sarvasya rājānam asṛjat prabhuḥ // Mn_7.3 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2365: candravitteśayoś caiva mātrā nirhṛtya śāśvatīḥ // Mn_7.4 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2366: yasmād eṣāṃ surendrāṇāṃ mātrābhyo nirmito nṛpaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2367: tasmād abhibhavaty eṣa sarvabhūtāni tejasā // Mn_7.5 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2368: tapaty ādityavac caiṣa cakṣūṃṣi ca manāṃsi ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:2369: na cainaṃ bhuvi śaknoti kaś cid apy abhivīkṣitum // Mn_7.6 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2370: so 'gnir bhavati vāyuś ca so 'rkaḥ somaḥ sa dharmarāṭ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2371: sa kuberaḥ sa varuṇaḥ sa mahendraḥ prabhāvataḥ // Mn_7.7 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2373: mahatī devatā hy eṣā nararūpeṇa tiṣṭhati // Mn_7.8 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2374: ekam eva dahaty agnir naraṃ durupasarpiṇam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2376: kāryaṃ so 'vekṣya śaktiṃ ca deśakālau ca tattvataḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2377: kurute dharmasiddhyarthaṃ viśvarūpaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // Mn_7.10 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2378: yasya prasāde padmā śrīr vijayaś ca parākrame /
GSD36manu2p_u:2379: mṛtyuś ca vasati krodhe sarvatejomayo hi saḥ // Mn_7.11 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2380: taṃ yas tu dveṣṭi saṃmohāt sa vinaśyaty asaṃśayam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2381: tasya hy āśu vināśāya rājā prakurute manaḥ // Mn_7.12 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2382: tasmād dharmaṃ yam iṣṭeṣu sa vyavasyen narādhipaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2383: aniṣṭaṃ cāpy aniṣṭeṣu taṃ dharmaṃ na vicālayet // Mn_7.13 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2385: brahmatejomayaṃ daṇḍam asṛjat pūrvam īśvaraḥ // Mn_7.14 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2386: tasya sarvāṇi bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:2387: bhayād bhogāya kalpante svadharmān na calanti ca // Mn_7.15 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2388: taṃ deśakālau śaktiṃ ca vidyāṃ cāvekṣya tattvataḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2390: sa rājā puruṣo daṇḍaḥ sa netā śāsitā ca saḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2391: caturṇām āśramāṇāṃ ca dharmasya pratibhūḥ smṛtaḥ // Mn_7.17 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2392: daṇḍaḥ śāsti prajāḥ sarvā daṇḍa evābhirakṣati /
GSD36manu2p_u:2393: daṇḍaḥ supteṣu jāgarti daṇḍaṃ dharmaṃ vidur budhāḥ // Mn_7.18 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2394: samīkṣya sa dhṛtaḥ samyak sarvā rañjayati prajāḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2395: asamīkṣya praṇītas tu vināśayati sarvataḥ // Mn_7.19 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2396: yadi na praṇayed rājā daṇḍaṃ daṇḍyeṣv atandritaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2397: śūle matsyān ivāpakṣyan durbalān balavattarāḥ // Mn_7.20 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2398: adyāt kākaḥ puroḍāśaṃ śvā ca lihyād dhavis tathā /
GSD36manu2p_u:2399: svāmyaṃ ca na syāt kasmiṃś cit pravartetādharottaram // Mn_7.21 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2400: sarvo daṇḍajito loko durlabho hi śucir naraḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2401: daṇḍasya hi bhayāt sarvaṃ jagad bhogāya kalpate // Mn_7.22 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2403: te 'pi bhogāya kalpante daṇḍenaiva nipīḍitāḥ // Mn_7.23 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2405: sarvalokaprakopaś ca bhaved daṇḍasya vibhramāt // Mn_7.24 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2406: yatra śyāmo lohitākṣo daṇḍaś carati pāpahā /
GSD36manu2p_u:2407: prajās tatra na muhyanti netā cet sādhu paśyati // Mn_7.25 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2411: kāmātmā viṣamaḥ kṣudro daṇḍenaiva nihanyate // Mn_7.27 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2413: dharmād vicalitaṃ hanti nṛpam eva sabāndhavam // Mn_7.28 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2414: tato durgaṃ ca rāṣṭraṃ ca lokaṃ ca sacarācaram /
