GSD36manu2p_u:2654: yasya mantraṃ na jānanti samāgamya pṛthagjanāḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2655: sa kṛtsnāṃ pṛthivīṃ bhuṅkte kośahīno 'pi pārthivaḥ // Mn_7.148[149M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2658: bhindanty avamatā mantraṃ tairyagyonās tathaiva ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:2659: striyaś caiva viśeṣeṇa tasmāt tatrādṛto bhavet // Mn_7.150[151M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2661: cintayed dharmakāmārthān sārdhaṃ tair eka eva vā // Mn_7.151[152M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2663: kanyānāṃ saṃpradānaṃ ca kumārāṇāṃ ca rakṣaṇaṃ // Mn_7.152[153M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2665: antaḥpurapracāraṃ ca praṇidhīnāṃ ca ceṣṭitam // Mn_7.153[154M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2666: kṛtsnaṃ cāṣṭavidhaṃ karma pañcavargaṃ ca tattvataḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2667: anurāgāparāgau ca pracāraṃ maṇḍalasya ca // Mn_7.154[155M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2668: madhyamasya pracāraṃ ca vijīgiṣoś ca ceṣṭitam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2669: udāsīnapracāraṃ ca śatroś caiva prayatnataḥ // Mn_7.155[156M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2671: aṣṭau cānyāḥ samākhyātā dvādaśaiva tu tāḥ smṛtāḥ // Mn_7.156[157M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2673: pratyekaṃ kathitā hy etāḥ saṃkṣepeṇa dvisaptatiḥ // Mn_7.157[158M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2674: anantaram ariṃ vidyād arisevinam eva ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:2675: arer anantaraṃ mitram udāsīnaṃ tayoḥ param // Mn_7.158[159M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2677: vyastaiś caiva samastaiś ca pauruṣeṇa nayena ca // Mn_7.159[160M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2678: saṃdhiṃ ca vigrahaṃ caiva yānam āsanam eva ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:2679: dvaidhībhāvaṃ saṃśrayaṃ ca ṣaḍguṇāṃś cintayet sadā // Mn_7.160[161M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2680: āsanaṃ caiva yānaṃ ca saṃdhiṃ vigraham eva ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:2681: kāryaṃ vīkṣya prayuñjīta dvaidhaṃ saṃśrayam eva ca // Mn_7.161[162M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2682: saṃdhiṃ tu dvividhaṃ vidyād rājā vigraham eva ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:2683: ubhe yānāsane caiva dvividhaḥ saṃśrayaḥ smṛtaḥ // Mn_7.162[163M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2685: tadā tv āyatisaṃyuktaḥ saṃdhir jñeyo dvilakṣaṇaḥ // Mn_7.163[164M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2686: svayaṃkṛtaś ca kāryārtham akāle kāla eva vā /
GSD36manu2p_u:2687: mitrasya caivāpakṛte dvividho vigrahaḥ smṛtaḥ // Mn_7.164[165M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2689: saṃhatasya ca mitreṇa dvividhaṃ yānam ucyate // Mn_7.165[166M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2690: kṣīṇasya caiva kramaśo daivāt pūrvakṛtena vā /
GSD36manu2p_u:2691: mitrasya cānurodhena dvividhaṃ smṛtam āsanam // Mn_7.166[167M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2695: sādhuṣu vyapadeśaś ca dvividhaḥ saṃśrayaḥ smṛtaḥ // Mn_7.168[169M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2697: tadātve cālpikāṃ pīḍāṃ tadā saṃdhiṃ samāśrayet // Mn_7.169[170M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2698: yadā prahṛṣṭā manyeta sarvās tu prakṛtīr bhṛśam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2699: atyucchritaṃ tathātmānaṃ tadā kurvīta vigraham // Mn_7.170[171M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2700: yadā manyeta bhāvena hṛṣṭaṃ puṣṭaṃ balaṃ svakam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2701: parasya viparītaṃ ca tadā yāyād ripuṃ prati // Mn_7.171[172M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2702: yadā tu syāt parikṣīṇo vāhanena balena ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:2703: tadāsīta prayatnena śanakaiḥ sāntvayann arīn // Mn_7.172[173M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2705: tadā dvidhā balaṃ kṛtvā sādhayet kāryam ātmanaḥ // Mn_7.173[174M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2707: tadā tu saṃśrayet kṣipraṃ dhārmikaṃ balinaṃ nṛpam // Mn_7.174[175M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2708: nigrahaṃ prakṛtīnāṃ ca kuryād yo 'ribalasya ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:2709: upaseveta taṃ nityaṃ sarvayatnair guruṃ yathā // Mn_7.175[176M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2711: suyuddham eva tatrāpi nirviśaṅkaḥ samācaret // Mn_7.176[177M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2715: atītānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ guṇadoṣau ca tattvataḥ // Mn_7.178[179M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2719: tathā sarvaṃ saṃvidadhyād eṣa sāmāsiko nayaḥ // Mn_7.180[181M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2720: tadā tu yānam ātiṣṭhed arirāṣṭraṃ prati prabhuḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2721: tadānena vidhānena yāyād aripuraṃ śanaiḥ // Mn_7.181[182M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2722: mārgaśīrṣe śubhe māsi yāyād yātrāṃ mahīpatiḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2723: phālgunaṃ vātha caitraṃ vā māsau prati yathābalam // Mn_7.182[183M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2724: anyeṣv api tu kāleṣu yadā paśyed dhruvaṃ jayam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2725: tadā yāyād vigṛhyaiva vyasane cotthite ripoḥ // Mn_7.183[184M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2726: kṛtvā vidhānaṃ mūle tu yātrikaṃ ca yathāvidhi /
GSD36manu2p_u:2727: upagṛhyāspadaṃ caiva cārān samyag vidhāya ca // Mn_7.184[185M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2728: saṃśodhya trividhaṃ mārgaṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ ca balaṃ svakam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2730: śatrusevini mitre ca gūḍhe yuktataro bhavet /
GSD36manu2p_u:2731: gatapratyāgate caiva sa hi kaṣṭataro ripuḥ // Mn_7.186[187M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2732: daṇḍavyūhena tan mārgaṃ yāyāt tu śakaṭena vā /
GSD36manu2p_u:2733: varāhamakarābhyāṃ vā sūcyā vā garuḍena vā // Mn_7.187[188M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2734: yataś ca bhayam āśaṅket tato vistārayed balam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2735: padmena caiva vyūhena niviśeta sadā svayam // Mn_7.188[189M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2737: yataś ca bhayam āśaṅket prācīṃ tāṃ kalpayed diśam // Mn_7.189[190M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2738: gulmāṃś ca sthāpayed āptān kṛtasaṃjñān samantataḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2739: sthāne yuddhe ca kuśalān abhīrūn avikāriṇaḥ // Mn_7.190[191M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2740: saṃhatān yodhayed alpān kāmaṃ vistārayed bahūn /
GSD36manu2p_u:2741: sūcyā vajreṇa caivaitān vyūhena vyūhya yodhayet // Mn_7.191[192M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2742: syandanāśvaiḥ same yudhyed anūpe nau dvipais tathā /
GSD36manu2p_u:2744: kurukṣetrāṃś ca matsyāṃś ca pañcālāñ śūrasenajān /
GSD36manu2p_u:2745: dīrghāṃl laghūṃś caiva narān agrānīkeṣu yojayet // Mn_7.193[194M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2746: praharṣayed balaṃ vyūhya tāṃś ca samyak parīkṣayet /
GSD36manu2p_u:2747: ceṣṭāś caiva vijānīyād arīn yodhayatām api // Mn_7.194[195M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2751: samavaskandayec cainaṃ rātrau vitrāsayet tathā // Mn_7.196[197M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2753: yukte ca daive yudhyeta jayaprepsur apetabhīḥ // Mn_7.197[198M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2754: sāmnā dānena bhedena samastair atha vā pṛthak /
GSD36manu2p_u:2755: vijetuṃ prayatetārīn na yuddhena kadā cana // Mn_7.198[199M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2757: parājayaś ca saṃgrāme tasmād yuddhaṃ vivarjayet // Mn_7.199[200M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2759: tathā yudhyeta saṃpanno vijayeta ripūn yathā // Mn_7.200[201M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2760: jitvā saṃpūjayed devān brāhmaṇāṃś caiva dhārmikān /
GSD36manu2p_u:2761: pradadyāt parihārārthaṃ khyāpayed abhayāni ca // Mn_7.201[202M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2763: sthāpayet tatra tadvaṃśyaṃ kuryāc ca samayakriyām // Mn_7.202[203M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2764: pramāṇāni ca kurvīta teṣāṃ dharmān yathoditān /
GSD36manu2p_u:2765: ratnaiś ca pūjayed enaṃ pradhānapuruṣaiḥ saha // Mn_7.203[204M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2767: abhīpsitānām arthānāṃ kāle yuktaṃ praśasyate // Mn_7.204[205M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2769: tayor daivam acintyaṃ tu mānuṣe vidyate kriyā // Mn_7.205[206M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2770: daivena vidhinā yuktaṃ mānuṣyaṃ yat pravartate /
GSD36manu2p_u:2773: vinā puruṣakāreṇa phalaṃ kṣetraṃ prayacchati // Mn_7.208M //
GSD36manu2p_u:2774: candrārkādyā grahā vāyur agnir āpas tathaiva ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:2775: iha daivena sādhyante pauruṣeṇa prayatnataḥ // Mn_7.209M //
GSD36manu2p_u:2776: saha vāpi vrajed yuktaḥ saṃdhiṃ kṛtvā prayatnataḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2777: mitraṃ hiraṇyaṃ bhūmiṃ vā saṃpaśyaṃs trividhaṃ phalam // Mn_7.206[210M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2778: pārṣṇigrāhaṃ ca saṃprekṣya tathākrandaṃ ca maṇḍale /
GSD36manu2p_u:2779: mitrād athāpy amitrād vā yātrāphalam avāpnuyāt // Mn_7.207[211M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2781: yathā mitraṃ dhruvaṃ labdhvā kṛśam apy āyatikṣamam // Mn_7.208[212M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2782: dharmajñaṃ ca kṛtajñaṃ ca tuṣṭaprakṛtim eva ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:2784: prājñaṃ kulīnaṃ śūraṃ ca dakṣaṃ dātāram eva ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:2785: kṛtajñaṃ dhṛtimantaṃ ca kaṣṭam āhur ariṃ budhāḥ // Mn_7.210[214M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2789: parityajen nṛpo bhūmim ātmārtham avicārayan // Mn_7.212[216M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2790: āpadarthaṃ dhanaṃ rakṣed dārān rakṣed dhanair api /
GSD36manu2p_u:2791: ātmānaṃ satataṃ rakṣed dārair api dhanair api // Mn_7.213[217M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2793: saṃyuktāṃś ca viyuktāṃś ca sarvopāyān sṛjed budhaḥ // Mn_7.214[218M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2794: upetāram upeyaṃ ca sarvopāyāṃś ca kṛtsnaśaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2796: evaṃ sarvam idaṃ rājā saha sammantrya mantribhiḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2797: vyāyamyāplutya madhyāhne bhoktum antaḥpuraṃ viśet // Mn_7.216[220M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2799: suparīkṣitam annādyam adyān mantrair viṣāpahaiḥ // Mn_7.217[221M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2801: viṣaghnāni ca ratnāni niyato dhārayet sadā // Mn_7.218[222M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2805: snāne prasādhane caiva sarvālaṅkārakeṣu ca // Mn_7.220[224M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2806: bhuktavān viharec caiva strībhir antaḥpure saha /
GSD36manu2p_u:2807: vihṛtya tu yathākālaṃ punaḥ kāryāṇi cintayet // Mn_7.221[225M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2808: alaṃkṛtaś ca saṃpaśyed āyudhīyaṃ punar janam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2809: vāhanāni ca sarvāṇi śastrāṇy ābharaṇāni ca // Mn_7.222[226M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2811: rahasyākhyāyināṃ caiva praṇidhīnāṃ ca ceṣṭitam // Mn_7.223[227M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2812: gatvā kakṣāntaraṃ tv anyat samanujñāpya taṃ janam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2813: praviśed bhojanārthaṃ ca strīvṛto 'ntaḥpuraṃ punaḥ // Mn_7.224[228M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2814: tatra bhuktvā punaḥ kiṃ cit tūryaghoṣaiḥ praharṣitaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2815: saṃviśet taṃ yathākālam uttiṣṭhec ca gataklamaḥ // Mn_7.255[229M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2817: asvasthaḥ sarvam etat tu bhṛtyeṣu viniyojayet // Mn_7.226[230M] //
GSD36manu2p_u:2818: vyavahārān didṛkṣus tu brāhmaṇaiḥ saha pārthivaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2819: mantrajñair mantribhiś caiva vinītaḥ praviśet sabhām // Mn_8.1 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2820: tatrāsīnaḥ sthito vāpi pāṇim udyamya dakṣiṇam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2822: pratyahaṃ deśadṛṣṭaiś ca śāstradṛṣṭaiś ca hetubhiḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2823: aṣṭādaśasu mārgeṣu nibaddhāni pṛthak pṛthak // Mn_8.3 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2825: saṃbhūya ca samutthānaṃ dattasyānapakarma ca // Mn_8.4 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2829: steyaṃ ca sāhasaṃ caiva strīsaṃgrahaṇam eva ca // Mn_8.6 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2830: strīpuṃdharmo vibhāgaś ca dyūtam āhvaya eva ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:2832: eṣu sthāneṣu bhūyiṣṭhaṃ vivādaṃ caratāṃ nṛṇām /
GSD36manu2p_u:2833: dharmaṃ śāśvatam āśritya kuryāt kāryavinirṇayam // Mn_8.8 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2834: yadā svayaṃ na kuryāt tu nṛpatiḥ kāryadarśanam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2835: tadā niyuñjyād vidvāṃsaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ kāryadarśane // Mn_8.9 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2836: so 'sya kāryāṇi saṃpaśyet sabhyair eva tribhir vṛtaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2837: sabhām eva praviśyāgryām āsīnaḥ sthita eva vā // Mn_8.10 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2838: yasmin deśe niṣīdanti viprā vedavidas trayaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2839: rājñaś cādhikṛto vidvān brahmaṇas tāṃ sabhāṃ viduḥ // Mn_8.11 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2840: dharmo viddhas tv adharmeṇa sabhāṃ yatropatiṣṭhate /
GSD36manu2p_u:2841: śalyaṃ cāsya na kṛntanti viddhās tatra sabhāsadaḥ // Mn_8.12 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2842: sabhāṃ vā na praveṣṭavyaṃ vaktavyaṃ vā samañjasam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2843: abruvan vibruvan vāpi naro bhavati kilbiṣī // Mn_8.13 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2844: yatra dharmo hy adharmeṇa satyaṃ yatrānṛtena ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:2845: hanyate prekṣamāṇānāṃ hatās tatra sabhāsadaḥ // Mn_8.14 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2846: dharma eva hato hanti dharmo rakṣati rakṣitaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2847: tasmād dharmo na hantavyo mā no dharmo hato 'vadhīt // Mn_8.15 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2848: vṛṣo hi bhagavān dharmas tasya yaḥ kurute hy alam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2849: vṛṣalaṃ taṃ vidur devās tasmād dharmaṃ na lopayet // Mn_8.16 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2850: eka eva suhṛd dharmo nidhāne 'py anuyāti yaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2851: śarīreṇa samaṃ nāśaṃ sarvam anyad dhi gacchati // Mn_8.17 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2853: pādaḥ sabhāsadaḥ sarvān pādo rājānam ṛcchati // Mn_8.18 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2854: rājā bhavaty anenās tu mucyante ca sabhāsadaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2855: eno gacchati kartāraṃ nindārho yatra nindyate // Mn_8.19 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2857: dharmapravaktā nṛpater na tu śūdraḥ kathaṃ cana // Mn_8.20 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2858: yasya śūdras tu kurute rājño dharmavivecanam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2859: tasya sīdati tad rāṣṭraṃ paṅke gaur iva paśyataḥ // Mn_8.21 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2861: vinaśyaty āśu tat kṛtsnaṃ durbhikṣavyādhipīḍitam // Mn_8.22 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2864: arthānarthāv ubhau buddhvā dharmādharmau ca kevalau /
GSD36manu2p_u:2865: varṇakrameṇa sarvāṇi paśyet kāryāṇi kāryiṇām // Mn_8.24 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2866: bāhyair vibhāvayel liṅgair bhāvam antargataṃ nṛṇām /
GSD36manu2p_u:2868: ākārair iṅgitair gatyā ceṣṭayā bhāṣitena ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:2871: yāvat sa syāt samāvṛtto yāvac cātītaśaiśavaḥ // Mn_8.27 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2872: vaśāputrāsu caivaṃ syād rakṣaṇaṃ niṣkulāsu ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:2873: pativratāsu ca strīṣu vidhavāsv āturāsu ca // Mn_8.28 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2874: jīvantīnāṃ tu tāsāṃ ye tad dhareyuḥ svabāndhavāḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2875: tāñ śiṣyāc cauradaṇḍena dhārmikaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ // Mn_8.29 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2877: arvāk tryabdād dharet svāmī pareṇa nṛpatir haret // Mn_8.30 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2878: mamedam iti yo brūyāt so 'nuyojyo yathāvidhi /
GSD36manu2p_u:2879: saṃvādya rūpasaṃkhyādīn svāmī tad dravyam arhati // Mn_8.31 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2880: avedayāno naṣṭasya deśaṃ kālaṃ ca tattvataḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2881: varṇaṃ rūpaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca tatsamaṃ daṇḍam arhati // Mn_8.32 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2883: daśamaṃ dvādaśaṃ vāpi satāṃ dharmam anusmaran // Mn_8.33 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2885: yāṃs tatra caurān gṛhṇīyāt tān rājebhena ghātayet // Mn_8.34 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2886: mamāyam iti yo brūyān nidhiṃ satyena mānavaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2887: tasyādadīta ṣaḍbhāgaṃ rājā dvādaśam eva vā // Mn_8.35 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2888: anṛtaṃ tu vadan daṇḍyaḥ svavittasyāṃśam aṣṭamam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2889: tasyaiva vā nidhānasya saṃkhyayālpīyasīṃ kalām // Mn_8.36 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2890: vidvāṃs tu brāhmaṇo dṛṣṭvā pūrvopanihitaṃ nidhim /
GSD36manu2p_u:2891: aśeṣato 'py ādadīta sarvasyādhipatir hi saḥ // Mn_8.38 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2892: yaṃ tu paśyen nidhiṃ rājā purāṇaṃ nihitaṃ kṣitau /
GSD36manu2p_u:2893: tasmād dvijebhyo dattvārdham ardhaṃ kośe praveśayet // Mn_8.38 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2894: nidhīnāṃ tu purāṇānāṃ dhātūnām eva ca kṣitau /
GSD36manu2p_u:2895: ardhabhāg rakṣaṇād rājā bhūmer adhipatir hi saḥ // Mn_8.39 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2896: dātavyaṃ sarvavarṇebhyo rājñā caurair hṛtaṃ dhanam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2897: rājā tad upayuñjānaś caurasyāpnoti kilbiṣam // Mn_8.40 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2899: samīkṣya kuladharmāṃś ca svadharmaṃ pratipādayet // Mn_8.41 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2900: svāni karmāṇi kurvāṇā dūre santo 'pi mānavāḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2901: priyā bhavanti lokasya sve sve karmaṇy avasthitāḥ // Mn_8.42 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2902: notpādayet svayaṃ kāryaṃ rājā nāpy asya puruṣaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2903: na ca prāpitam anyena grased arthaṃ kathaṃ cana // Mn_8.43 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2904: yathā nayaty asṛkpātair mṛgasya mṛgayuḥ padam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2905: nayet tathānumānena dharmasya nṛpatiḥ padam // Mn_8.44 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2906: satyam arthaṃ ca saṃpaśyed ātmānam atha sākṣiṇaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2907: deśaṃ rūpaṃ ca kālaṃ ca vyavahāravidhau sthitaḥ // Mn_8.45 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2908: sadbhir ācaritaṃ yat syād dhārmikaiś ca dvijātibhiḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2912: yair yair upāyair arthaṃ svaṃ prāpnuyād uttamarṇikaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2913: tair tair upāyaiḥ saṃgṛhya dāpayed adhamarṇikam // Mn_8.48 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2915: prayuktaṃ sādhayed arthaṃ pañcamena balena ca // Mn_8.49 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2917: na sa rājñābhiyoktavyaḥ svakaṃ saṃsādhayan dhanam // Mn_8.50 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2919: dāpayed dhanikasyārthaṃ daṇḍaleśaṃ ca śaktitaḥ // Mn_8.51 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2921: abhiyoktā diśed deśyaṃ karaṇaṃ vānyad uddiśet // Mn_8.52 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2922: adeśyaṃ yaś ca diśati nirdiśyāpahnute ca yaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2923: yaś cādharottarān arthān vigītān nāvabudhyate // Mn_8.53 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2924: apadiśyāpadeśyaṃ ca punar yas tv apadhāvati /
GSD36manu2p_u:2925: samyak praṇihitaṃ cārthaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ san nābhinandati // Mn_8.54 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2926: asaṃbhāṣye sākṣibhiś ca deśe saṃbhāṣate mithaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2927: nirucyamānaṃ praśnaṃ ca necched yaś cāpi niṣpatet // Mn_8.55 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2928: brūhīty uktaś ca na brūyād uktaṃ ca na vibhāvayet /
GSD36manu2p_u:2929: na ca pūrvāparaṃ vidyāt tasmād arthāt sa hīyate // Mn_8.56 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2930: sākṣiṇaḥ santi mety uktvā diśety ukto diśen na yaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2931: dharmasthaḥ kāraṇair etair hīnaṃ tam api nirdiśet // Mn_8.57 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2932: abhiyoktā na ced brūyād badhyo daṇḍyaś ca dharmataḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2933: na cet tripakṣāt prabrūyād dharmaṃ prati parājitaḥ // Mn_8.58 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2934: yo yāvan nihnuvītārthaṃ mithyā yāvati vā vadet /
GSD36manu2p_u:2935: tau nṛpeṇa hy adharmajñau dāpyo taddviguṇaṃ damam // Mn_8.59 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2939: tādṛśān saṃpravakṣyāmi yathā vācyam ṛtaṃ ca taiḥ // Mn_8.61 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2941: arthyuktāḥ sākṣyam arhanti na ye ke cid anāpadi // Mn_8.62 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2942: āptāḥ sarveṣu varṇeṣu kāryāḥ kāryeṣu sākṣiṇaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2944: nārthasaṃbandhino nāptā na sahāyā na vairiṇaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2945: na dṛṣṭadoṣāḥ kartavyā na vyādhyārtā na dūṣitāḥ // Mn_8.64 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2946: na sākṣī nṛpatiḥ kāryo na kārukakuśīlavau /
GSD36manu2p_u:2947: na śrotriyo na liṅgastho na saṅgebhyo vinirgataḥ // Mn_8.65 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2948: nādhyadhīno na vaktavyo na dasyur na vikarmakṛt /
GSD36manu2p_u:2949: na vṛddho na śiśur naiko nāntyo na vikalendriyaḥ // Mn_8.66 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2950: nārto na matto nonmatto na kṣuttṛṣṇopapīḍitaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2951: na śramārto na kāmārto na kruddho nāpi taskaraḥ // Mn_8.67 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2952: strīṇāṃ sākṣyaṃ striyaḥ kuryur dvijānāṃ sadṛśā dvijāḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2953: śūdrāś ca santaḥ śūdrāṇām antyānām antyayonayaḥ // Mn_8.68 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2954: anubhāvī tu yaḥ kaś cit kuryāt sākṣyaṃ vivādinām /
GSD36manu2p_u:2955: antarveśmany araṇye vā śarīrasyāpi cātyaye // Mn_8.69 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2956: striyāpy asaṃbhāve kāryaṃ bālena sthavireṇa vā /
GSD36manu2p_u:2957: śiṣyeṇa bandhunā vāpi dāsena bhṛtakena vā // Mn_8.70 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2959: jānīyād asthirāṃ vācam utsiktamanasāṃ tathā // Mn_8.71 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2961: vāgdaṇḍayoś ca pāruṣye na parīkṣeta sākṣiṇaḥ // Mn_8.72 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2963: sameṣu tu guṇotkṛṣṭān guṇidvaidhe dvijottamān // Mn_8.73 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2965: tatra satyaṃ bruvan sākṣī dharmārthābhyāṃ na hīyate // Mn_8.74 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2967: avāṅ narakam abhyeti pretya svargāc ca hīyate // Mn_8.75 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2969: pṛṣṭas tatrāpi tad brūyād yathādṛṣṭaṃ yathāśrutam // Mn_8.76 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2970: eko 'lubdhas tu sākṣī syād bahvyaḥ śucyo 'pi na striyaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2971: strībuddher asthiratvāt tu doṣaiś cānye 'pi ye vṛtāḥ // Mn_8.77 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2972: svabhāvenaiva yad brūyus tad grāhyaṃ vyāvahārikam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2973: ato yad anyad vibrūyur dharmārthaṃ tad apārthakam // Mn_8.78 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2976: yad dvayor anayor vettha kārye 'smiṃś ceṣṭitaṃ mithaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2977: tad brūta sarvaṃ satyena yuṣmākaṃ hy atra sākṣitā // Mn_8.80 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2978: satyaṃ sākṣye bruvan sākṣī lokān āpnoti puṣkalān /
GSD36manu2p_u:2979: iha cānuttamāṃ kīrtiṃ vāg eṣā brahmapūjitā // Mn_8.81 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2980: sākṣye 'nṛtaṃ vadan pāśair badhyate vāruṇair bhṛśam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2981: vivaśaḥ śatam ājātīs tasmāt sākṣyaṃ vaded ṛtam // Mn_8.82 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2982: satyena pūyate sākṣī dharmaḥ satyena vardhate /
GSD36manu2p_u:2983: tasmāt satyaṃ hi vaktavyaṃ sarvavarṇeṣu sākṣibhiḥ // Mn_8.83 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2984: ātmaiva hy ātmanaḥ sākṣī gatir ātmā tathātmanaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2985: māvamaṃsthāḥ svam ātmānaṃ nṛṇāṃ sākṣiṇam uttamam // Mn_8.84 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2986: manyante vai pāpakṛto na kaś cit paśyatīti naḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2987: tāṃs tu devāḥ prapaśyanti svasyaivāntarapūruṣaḥ // Mn_8.85 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2989: rātriḥ saṃdhye ca dharmaś ca vṛttajñāḥ sarvadehinām // Mn_8.86 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2991: udaṅmukhān prāṅmukhān vā pūrvāhṇe vai śuciḥ śucīn // Mn_8.87 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2992: brūhīti brāhmaṇaṃ pṛcchet satyaṃ brūhīti pārthivam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2993: gobījakāñcanair vaiśyaṃ śūdraṃ sarvais tu pātakaiḥ // Mn_8.88 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2994: brahmaghno ye smṛtā lokā ye ca strībālaghātinaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:2995: mitradruhaḥ kṛtaghnasya te te syur bruvato mṛṣā // Mn_8.89 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2996: janmaprabhṛti yat kiṃ cit puṇyaṃ bhadra tvayā kṛtam /
GSD36manu2p_u:2997: tat te sarvaṃ śuno gacched yadi brūyās tvam anyathā // Mn_8.90 //
GSD36manu2p_u:2998: eko 'ham asmīty ātmānaṃ yas tvaṃ kalyāṇa manyase /
GSD36manu2p_u:2999: nityaṃ sthitas te hṛdy eṣa puṇyapāpekṣitā muniḥ // Mn_8.91 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3000: yamo vaivasvato devo yas tavaiṣa hṛdi sthitaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3001: tena ced avivādas te mā gaṅgāṃ mā kurūn gamaḥ // Mn_8.92 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3002: nagno muṇḍaḥ kapālena ca bhikṣārthī kṣutpipāsitaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3003: andhaḥ śatrukulaṃ gacched yaḥ sākṣyam anṛtaṃ vadet // Mn_8.93 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3004: avākśirās tamasy andhe kilbiṣī narakaṃ vrajet /
GSD36manu2p_u:3005: yaḥ praśnaṃ vitathaṃ brūyāt pṛṣṭaḥ san dharmaniścaye // Mn_8.94 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3006: andho matsyān ivāśnāti sa naraḥ kaṇṭakaiḥ saha /
GSD36manu2p_u:3007: yo bhāṣate 'rthavaikalyam apratyakṣaṃ sabhāṃ gataḥ // Mn_8.95 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3008: yasya vidvān hi vadataḥ kṣetrajño nābhiśaṅkate /
GSD36manu2p_u:3009: tasmān na devāḥ śreyāṃsaṃ loke 'nyaṃ puruṣaṃ viduḥ // Mn_8.96 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3010: yāvato bāndhavān yasmin hanti sākṣye 'nṛtaṃ vadan /
GSD36manu2p_u:3011: tāvataḥ saṃkhyayā tasmin śṛṇu saumyānupūrvaśaḥ // Mn_8.97 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3012: pañca paśvanṛte hanti daśa hanti gavānṛte /
GSD36manu2p_u:3013: śatam aśvānṛte hanti sahasraṃ puruṣānṛte // Mn_8.98 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3014: hanti jātān ajātāṃś ca hiraṇyārthe 'nṛtaṃ vadan /
GSD36manu2p_u:3015: sarvaṃ bhūmyanṛte hanti mā sma bhūmyanṛtaṃ vadīḥ // Mn_8.99 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3016: apsu bhūmivad ity āhuḥ strīṇāṃ bhoge ca maithune /
GSD36manu2p_u:3017: abjeṣu caiva ratneṣu sarveṣv aśmamayeṣu ca // Mn_8.100 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3018: etān doṣān avekṣya tvaṃ sarvān anṛtabhāṣaṇe /
GSD36manu2p_u:3019: yathāśrutaṃ yathādṛṣṭaṃ sarvam evāñjasā vada // Mn_8.101 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3021: preṣyān vārdhuṣikāṃś caiva viprān śūdravad ācaret // Mn_8.102 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3022: tad vadan dharmato 'rtheṣu jānann apy anythā naraḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3023: na svargāc cyavate lokād daivīṃ vācaṃ vadanti tām // Mn_8.103 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3025: tatra vaktavyam anṛtaṃ tad dhi satyād viśiṣyate // Mn_8.104 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3026: vāggaivatyaiś ca carubhir yajeraṃs te sarasvatīm /
GSD36manu2p_u:3027: anṛtasyainasas tasya kurvāṇā niṣkṛtiṃ parām // Mn_8.105 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3028: kūṣmāṇḍair vāpi juhuyād ghṛtam agnau yathāvidhi /
GSD36manu2p_u:3029: ud ity ṛcā vā vāruṇyā tṛcenābdaivatena vā // Mn_8.106 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3031: tadṛṇaṃ prāpnuyāt sarvaṃ daśabandhaṃ ca sarvataḥ // Mn_8.107 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3033: rogo 'gnir jñātimaraṇam ṛṇaṃ dāpyo damaṃ ca saḥ // Mn_8.108 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3035: avindaṃs tattvataḥ satyaṃ śapathenāpi lambhayet // Mn_8.109 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3036: maharṣibhiś ca devaiś ca kāryārthaṃ śapathāḥ kṛtāḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3037: vasiṣṭhaś cāpi śapathaṃ śepe paijavane nṛpe // Mn_8.110 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3038: na vṛthā śapathaṃ kuryāt svalpe 'py arthe naro budhaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3039: vṛthā hi śapathaṃ kurvan pretya ceha ca naśyati // Mn_8.111 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3041: brāhmaṇābhyupapattau ca śapathe nāsti pātakam // Mn_8.112 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3043: gobījakāñcanair vaiśyaṃ śūdraṃ sarvais tu pātakaiḥ // Mn_8.113 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3044: agniṃ vāhārayed enam apsu cainaṃ nimajjayet /
GSD36manu2p_u:3045: putradārasya vāpy enaṃ śirāṃsi sparśayet pṛthak // Mn_8.114 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3046: yam iddho na dahaty agnir āpo nonmajjayanti ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:3047: na cārtim ṛcchati kṣipraṃ sa jñeyaḥ śapathe śuciḥ // Mn_8.115 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3048: vatsasya hy abhiśastasya purā bhrātrā yavīyasā /
GSD36manu2p_u:3049: nāgnir dadāha romāpi satyena jagataḥ spaśaḥ // Mn_8.116 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3050: yasmin yasmin vivāde tu kauṭasākṣyaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet /
GSD36manu2p_u:3051: tat tat kāryaṃ nivarteta kṛtaṃ cāpy akṛtaṃ bhavet // Mn_8.117 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3052: lobhān mohād bhayān maitrāt kāmāt krodhāt tathaiva ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:3053: ajñānād bālabhāvāc ca sākṣyaṃ vitatham ucyate // Mn_8.118 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3054: eṣām anyatame sthāne yaḥ sākṣyam anṛtaṃ vadet /
GSD36manu2p_u:3055: tasya daṇḍaviśeṣāṃs tu pravakṣyāmy anupūrvaśaḥ // Mn_8.119 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3056: lobhāt sahasraṃ daṇḍyas tu mohāt pūrvaṃ tu sāhasam /
GSD36manu2p_u:3057: bhayād dvau madhyamau daṇḍau maitrāt pūrvaṃ caturguṇam // Mn_8.120 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3058: kāmād daśaguṇaṃ pūrvaṃ krodhāt tu triguṇaṃ param /
GSD36manu2p_u:3059: ajñānād dve śate pūrṇe bāliśyāc chatam eva tu // Mn_8.121 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3060: etān āhuḥ kauṭasākṣye proktān daṇḍān manīṣibhiḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3062: kauṭasākṣyaṃ tu kurvāṇāṃs trīn varṇān dhārmiko nṛpaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3063: pravāsayed daṇḍayitvā brāhmaṇaṃ tu vivāsayet // Mn_8.123 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3065: triṣu varṇeṣu yāni syur akṣato brāhmaṇo vrajet // Mn_8.124 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3066: upastham udaraṃ jihvā hastau pādau ca pañcamam /
GSD36manu2p_u:3067: cakṣur nāsā ca karṇau ca dhanaṃ dehas tathaiva ca // Mn_8.125 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3069: sārāparādho cālokya daṇḍaṃ daṇḍyeṣu pātayet // Mn_8.126 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3071: asvargyaṃ ca paratrāpi tasmāt tat parivarjayet // Mn_8.127 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3072: adaṇḍyān daṇḍayan rājā daṇḍyāṃś caivāpy adaṇḍayan /
GSD36manu2p_u:3073: ayaśo mahad āpnoti narakaṃ caiva gacchati // Mn_8.128 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3075: tṛtīyaṃ dhanadaṇḍaṃ tu vadhadaṇḍam ataḥ param // Mn_8.129 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3076: vadhenāpi yadā tv etān nigrahītuṃ na śaknuyāt /
GSD36manu2p_u:3077: tadaiṣu sarvam apy etat prayuñjīta catuṣṭayam // Mn_8.130 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3080: jālāntaragate bhānau yat sūkṣmaṃ dṛśyate rajaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3081: prathamaṃ tat pramāṇānāṃ trasareṇuṃ pracakṣate // Mn_8.132 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3083: tā rājasarṣapas tisras te trayo gaurasarṣapaḥ // Mn_8.133 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3084: sarṣapāḥ ṣaḍ yavo madhyas triyavaṃ tv ekakṛṣṇalam /
GSD36manu2p_u:3085: pañcakṛṣṇalako māṣas te suvarṇas tu ṣoḍaśa // Mn_8.134 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3086: palaṃ suvarṇāś catvāraḥ palāni dharaṇaṃ daśa /
GSD36manu2p_u:3087: dve kṛṣṇale samadhṛte vijñeyo raupyamāṣakaḥ // Mn_8.135 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3088: te ṣoḍaśa syād dharaṇaṃ purāṇaś caiva rājataḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3089: kārṣāpaṇas tu vijñeyas tāmrikaḥ kārṣikaḥ paṇaḥ // Mn_8.136 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3090: dharaṇāni daśa jñeyaḥ śatamānas tu rājataḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3091: catuḥsauvarṇiko niṣko vijñeyas tu pramāṇataḥ // Mn_8.137 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3092: paṇānāṃ dve śate sārdhe prathamaḥ sāhasaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3093: madhyamaḥ pañca vijñeyaḥ sahasraṃ tv eva cottamaḥ // Mn_8.138 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3094: ṛṇe deye pratijñāte pañcakaṃ śatam arhati /
GSD36manu2p_u:3095: apahnave taddviguṇaṃ tan manor anuśāsanam // Mn_8.139 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3097: aśītibhāgaṃ gṛhṇīyān māsād vārdhuṣikaḥ śate // Mn_8.140 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3098: dvikaṃ śataṃ vā gṛhṇīyāt satāṃ dharmam anusmaran /
GSD36manu2p_u:3099: dvikaṃ śataṃ hi gṛhṇāno na bhavaty arthakilbiṣī // Mn_8.141 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3100: dvikaṃ trikaṃ catuṣkaṃ ca pañcakaṃ ca śataṃ samam /
GSD36manu2p_u:3101: māsasya vṛddhiṃ gṛhṇīyād varṇānām anupūrvaśaḥ // Mn_8.142 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3102: na tv evādhau sopakāre kausīdīṃ vṛddhim āpnuyāt /
GSD36manu2p_u:3103: na cādheḥ kālasaṃrodhān nisargo 'sti na vikrayaḥ // Mn_8.143 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3104: na bhoktavyo balād ādhir bhuñjāno vṛddhim utsṛjet /
GSD36manu2p_u:3105: mūlyena toṣayec cainam ādhisteno 'nyathā bhavet // Mn_8.144 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3106: ādhiś copanidhiś cobhau na kālātyayam arhataḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3107: avahāryau bhavetāṃ tau dīrghakālam avasthitau // Mn_8.145 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3108: saṃprītyā bhujyamānāni na naśyanti kadā cana /
GSD36manu2p_u:3109: dhenur uṣṭro vahann aśvo yaś ca damyaḥ prayujyate // Mn_8.146 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3110: yat kiṃ cid daśavarṣāṇi saṃnidhau prekṣate dhanī /
GSD36manu2p_u:3111: bhujyamānaṃ parais tūṣṇīṃ na sa tal labdhum arhati // Mn_8.147 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3112: ajaḍaś ced apogaṇḍo viṣaye cāsya bhujyate /
GSD36manu2p_u:3113: bhagnaṃ tad vyavahāreṇa bhoktā tad dravyam arhati // Mn_8.148 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3115: rājasvaṃ śrotriyasvaṃ ca na bhogena praṇaśyati // Mn_8.149 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3117: tenārdhavṛddhir moktavyā tasya bhogasya niṣkṛtiḥ // Mn_8.150 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3119: dhānye sade lave vāhye nātikrāmati pañcatām // Mn_8.151 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3121: kusīdapatham āhus taṃ pañcakaṃ śatam arhati // Mn_8.152 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3122: nātisāṃvatsarīṃ vṛddhiṃ na cādṛṣṭāṃ punar haret /
GSD36manu2p_u:3123: cakravṛddhiḥ kālavṛddhiḥ kāritā kāyikā ca yā // Mn_8.153 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3124: ṛṇaṃ dātum aśakto yaḥ kartum icchet punaḥ kriyām /
GSD36manu2p_u:3125: sa dattvā nirjitāṃ vṛddhiṃ karaṇaṃ parivartayet // Mn_8.154 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3127: yāvatī saṃbhaved vṛddhis tāvatīṃ dātum arhati // Mn_8.155 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3129: atikrāman deśakālau na tatphalam avāpnuyāt // Mn_8.156 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3131: sthāpayanti tu yāṃ vṛddhiṃ sā tatrādhigamaṃ prati // Mn_8.157 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3132: yo yasya pratibhūs tiṣṭhed darśanāyeha mānavaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3133: adarśayan sa taṃ tasya prayacchet svadhanād ṛṇam // Mn_8.158 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3134: prātibhāvyaṃ vṛthādānam ākṣikaṃ saurikāṃ ca yat /
GSD36manu2p_u:3135: daṇḍaśulkāvaśeṣaṃ ca na putro dātum arhati // Mn_8.159 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3137: dānapratibhuvi prete dāyādān api dāpayet // Mn_8.160 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3139: paścāt pratibhuvi prete parīpset kena hetunā // Mn_8.161 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3140: nirādiṣṭadhanaś cet tu pratibhūḥ syād alaṃdhanaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3141: svadhanād eva tad dadyān nirādiṣṭa iti sthitiḥ // Mn_8.162 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3143: asaṃbaddhakṛtaś caiva vyāvahāro na sidhyati // Mn_8.163 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3144: satyā na bhāṣā bhavati yady api syāt pratiṣṭhitā /
GSD36manu2p_u:3145: bahiś ced bhāṣyate dharmān niyatād vyavahārikāt // Mn_8.164 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3147: yatra vāpy upadhiṃ paśyet tat sarvaṃ vinivartayet // Mn_8.165 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3148: grahītā yadi naṣṭaḥ syāt kuṭumbārthe kṛto vyayaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3149: dātavyaṃ bāndhavais tat syāt pravibhaktair api svataḥ // Mn_8.166 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3151: svadeśe vā videśe vā taṃ jyāyān na vicālayet // Mn_8.167 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3152: balād dattaṃ balād bhuktaṃ balād yac cāpi lekhitam /
GSD36manu2p_u:3153: sarvān balakṛtān arthān akṛtān manur abravīt // Mn_8.168 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3154: trayaḥ parārthe kliśyanti sākṣiṇaḥ pratibhūḥ kulam /
GSD36manu2p_u:3155: catvāras tūpacīyante vipra āḍhyo vaṇiṅ nṛpaḥ // Mn_8.169 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3157: na cādeyaṃ samṛddho 'pi sūkṣmam apy artham utsṛjet // Mn_8.170 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3159: daurbalyaṃ khyāpyate rājñaḥ sa pretyeha ca naśyati // Mn_8.171 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3160: svādānād varṇasaṃsargāt tv abalānāṃ ca rakṣaṇāt /
GSD36manu2p_u:3161: balaṃ saṃjāyate rājñaḥ sa pretyeha ca vardhate // Mn_8.172 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3162: tasmād yama iva svāmī svayaṃ hitvā priyāpriye /
GSD36manu2p_u:3163: varteta yāmyayā vṛttyā jitakrodho jitendriyaḥ // Mn_8.173 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3164: yas tv adharmeṇa kāryāṇi mohāt kuryān narādhipaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3165: acirāt taṃ durātmānaṃ vaśe kurvanti śatravaḥ // Mn_8.174 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3166: kāmakrodhau tu saṃyamya yo 'rthān dharmeṇa paśyati /
GSD36manu2p_u:3167: prajās tam anuvartante samudram iva sindhavaḥ // Mn_8.175 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3168: yaḥ sādhayantaṃ chandena vedayed dhanikaṃ nṛpe /
GSD36manu2p_u:3169: sa rājñā tac caturbhāgaṃ dāpyas tasya ca tad dhanam // Mn_8.176 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3171: samo 'vakṛṣṭajātis tu dadyāc chreyāṃs tu tac chanaiḥ // Mn_8.177 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3172: anena vidhinā rājā mitho vivadatāṃ nṛṇām /
GSD36manu2p_u:3175: mahāpakṣe dhaniny ārye nikṣepaṃ nikṣiped budhaḥ // Mn_8.179 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3176: yo yathā nikṣiped dhaste yam arthaṃ yasya mānavaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3177: sa tathaiva grahītavyo yathā dāyas tathā grahaḥ // Mn_8.180 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3178: yo nikṣepaṃ yācyamāno nikṣeptur na prayacchati /
GSD36manu2p_u:3179: sa yācyaḥ prāḍvivākena tan nikṣeptur asaṃnidhau // Mn_8.181 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3181: apadeśaiś ca saṃnyasya hiraṇyaṃ tasya tattvataḥ // Mn_8.182 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3183: na tatra vidyate kiṃ cid yat parair abhiyujyate // Mn_8.183 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3184: teṣāṃ na dadyād yadi tu tad dhiraṇyaṃ yathāvidhi /
GSD36manu2p_u:3185: ubhau nigṛhya dāpyaḥ syād iti dharmasya dhāraṇā // Mn_8.184 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3187: naśyato vinipāte tāv anipāte tv anāśinau // Mn_8.185 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3188: svayam eva tu yau dadyān mṛtasya pratyanantare /
GSD36manu2p_u:3189: na sa rājñābhiyoktavyo na nikṣeptuś ca bandhubhiḥ // Mn_8.186 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3191: vicārya tasya vā vṛttaṃ sāmnaiva parisādhayet // Mn_8.187 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3192: nikṣepeṣv eṣu sarveṣu vidhiḥ syāt parisādhane /
GSD36manu2p_u:3193: samudre nāpnuyāt kiṃ cid yadi tasmān na saṃharet // Mn_8.188 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3194: caurair hṛtaṃ jalenoḍham agninā dagdham eva vā /
GSD36manu2p_u:3195: na dadyād yadi tasmāt sa na saṃharati kiṃ cana // Mn_8.189 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3197: sarvair upāyair anvicchec chapathaiś caiva vaidikaiḥ // Mn_8.190 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3198: yo nikṣepaṃ nārpayati yaś cānikṣipya yācate /
GSD36manu2p_u:3199: tāv ubhau cauravac chāsyau dāpyau vā tatsamaṃ damam // Mn_8.191 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3202: upadhābhiś ca yaḥ kaś cit paradravyaṃ haren naraḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3203: sasahāyaḥ sa hantavyaḥ prakāśaṃ vividhair vadhaiḥ // Mn_8.193 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3204: nikṣepo yaḥ kṛto yena yāvāṃś ca kulasaṃnidhau /
GSD36manu2p_u:3205: tāvān eva sa vijñeyo vibruvan daṇḍam arhati // Mn_8.194 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3206: mitho dāyaḥ kṛto yena gṛhīto mitha eva vā /
GSD36manu2p_u:3207: mitha eva pradātavyo yathā dāyas tathā grahaḥ // Mn_8.195 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3209: rājā vinirṇayaṃ kuryād akṣiṇvan nyāsadhāriṇam // Mn_8.196 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3211: na taṃ nayeta sākṣyaṃ tu stenam astenamāninam // Mn_8.197 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3212: avahāryo bhavec caiva sānvayaḥ ṣaṭśataṃ damam /
GSD36manu2p_u:3214: asvāminā kṛto yas tu dāyo vikraya eva vā /
GSD36manu2p_u:3215: akṛtaḥ sa tu vijñeyo vyavahāre yathā sthitiḥ // Mn_8.199 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3216: saṃbhogo dṛśyate yatra na dṛśyetāgamaḥ kva cit /
GSD36manu2p_u:3217: āgamaḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra na saṃbhoga iti sthitiḥ // Mn_8.200 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3218: vikrayād yo dhanaṃ kiṃ cid gṛhṇīyat kulasaṃnidhau /
GSD36manu2p_u:3219: krayeṇa sa viśuddhaṃ hi nyāyato labhate dhanam // Mn_8.201 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3221: adaṇḍyo mucyate rājñā nāṣṭiko labhate dhanam // Mn_8.202 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3222: nānyad anyena saṃsṛṣṭa- rūpaṃ vikrayam arhati /
GSD36manu2p_u:3223: na cāsāraṃ na ca nyūnaṃ na dūreṇa tirohitam // Mn_8.203 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3224: anyāṃ ced darśayitvānyā voḍhuḥ kanyā pradīyate /
GSD36manu2p_u:3225: ubhe ta ekaśulkena vahed ity abravīn manuḥ // Mn_8.204 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3226: nonmattāyā na kuṣṭhinyā na ca yā spṛṣṭamaithunā /
GSD36manu2p_u:3227: pūrvaṃ doṣān abhikhyāpya pradātā daṇḍam arhati // Mn_8.205 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3228: ṛtvig yadi vṛto yajñe svakarma parihāpayet /
GSD36manu2p_u:3231: kṛtsnam eva labhetāṃśam anyenaiva ca kārayet // Mn_8.207 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3232: yasmin karmaṇi yās tu syur uktāḥ pratyaṅgadakṣiṇāḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3233: sa eva tā ādidīta bhajeran sarva eva vā // Mn_8.208 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3234: rathaṃ haret cādhvaryur brahmādhāne ca vājinam /
GSD36manu2p_u:3235: hotā vāpi hared aśvam udgātā cāpy anaḥ kraye // Mn_8.209 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3237: tṛtīyinas tṛtīyāṃśāś caturthāṃśāś ca pādinaḥ // Mn_8.210 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3238: saṃbhūya svāni karmāṇi kurvadbhir iha mānavaiḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3240: dharmārthaṃ yena dattaṃ syāt kasmai cid yācate dhanam /
GSD36manu2p_u:3241: paścāc ca na tathā tat syān na deyaṃ tasya tad bhavet // Mn_8.212 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3242: yadi saṃsādhayet tat tu darpāl lobhena vā punaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3243: rājñā dāpyaḥ suvarṇaṃ syāt tasya steyasya niṣkṛtiḥ // Mn_8.213 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3246: bhṛto nārto na kuryād yo darpāt karma yathoditam /
GSD36manu2p_u:3247: sa daṇḍyaḥ kṛṣṇalāny aṣṭau na deyaṃ cāsya vetanam // Mn_8.215 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3248: ārtas tu kuryāt svasthaḥ san yathābhāṣitam āditaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3249: sa dīrghasyāpi kālasya tal labhetaiva vetanam // Mn_8.216 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3250: yathoktam ārtaḥ sustho vā yas tat karma na kārayet /
GSD36manu2p_u:3251: na tasya vetanaṃ deyam alponasyāpi karmaṇaḥ // Mn_8.217 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3253: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi dharmaṃ samayabhedinām // Mn_8.218 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3255: visaṃvaden naro lobhāt taṃ rāṣṭrād vipravāsayet // Mn_8.219 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3257: catuḥsuvarṇān ṣaṇniṣkāṃś chatamānaṃ ca rājakam // Mn_8.220 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3260: krītvā vikrīya vā kiṃ cid yasyehānuśayo bhavet /
GSD36manu2p_u:3261: so 'ntar daśāhāt tad dravyaṃ dadyāc caivādadīta vā // Mn_8.222 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3262: pareṇa tu daśāhasya na dadyān nāpi dāpayet /
GSD36manu2p_u:3263: ādadāno dadat caiva rājñā daṇḍyau śatāni ṣaṭ // Mn_8.223 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3264: yas tu doṣavatīṃ kanyām anākhyāya prayacchati /
GSD36manu2p_u:3265: tasya kuryān nṛpo daṇḍaṃ svayaṃ ṣaṇṇavatiṃ paṇān // Mn_8.224 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3266: akanyeti tu yaḥ kanyāṃ brūyād dveṣeṇa mānavaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3267: sa śataṃ prāpnuyād daṇḍaṃ tasyā doṣam adarśayan // Mn_8.225 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3269: nākanyāsu kva cin nṝṇāṃ luptadharmakriyā hi tāḥ // Mn_8.226 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3271: teṣāṃ niṣṭhā tu vijñeyā vidvadbhiḥ saptame pade // Mn_8.227 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3272: yasmin yasmin kṛte kārye yasyehānuśayo bhavet /
GSD36manu2p_u:3273: tam anena vidhānena dharmye pathi niveśayet // Mn_8.228 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3274: paśuṣu svāmināṃ caiva pālānāṃ ca vyatikrame /
GSD36manu2p_u:3276: divā vaktavyatā pāle rātrau svāmini tadgṛhe /
GSD36manu2p_u:3277: yogakṣeme 'nyathā cet tu pālo vaktavyatām iyāt // Mn_8.230 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3278: gopaḥ kṣīrabhṛto yas tu sa duhyād daśato varām /
GSD36manu2p_u:3279: gosvāmyanumate bhṛtyaḥ sā syāt pāle 'bhṛte bhṛtiḥ // Mn_8.231 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3280: naṣṭaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ kṛmibhiḥ śvahataṃ viṣame mṛtam /
GSD36manu2p_u:3281: hīnaṃ puruṣakāreṇa pradadyāt pāla eva tu // Mn_8.232 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3282: vighuṣya tu hṛtaṃ caurair na pālo dātum arhati /
GSD36manu2p_u:3283: yadi deśe ca kāle ca svāminaḥ svasya śaṃsati // Mn_8.233 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3284: karṇau carma ca vālāṃś ca bastiṃ snāyuṃ ca rocanām /
GSD36manu2p_u:3285: paśuṣu svāmināṃ dadyān mṛteṣv aṅkāni darśayet // Mn_8.234 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3286: ajāvike tu saṃruddhe vṛkaiḥ pāle tv anāyati /
GSD36manu2p_u:3287: yāṃ prasahya vṛko hanyāt pāle tat kilbiṣaṃ bhavet // Mn_8.235 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3288: tāsāṃ ced avaruddhānāṃ carantīnāṃ mitho vane /
GSD36manu2p_u:3289: yām utplutya vṛko hanyān na pālas tatra kilbiṣī // Mn_8.236 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3291: śamyāpātās trayo vāpi triguṇo nagarasya tu // Mn_8.237 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3293: na tatra praṇayed daṇḍaṃ nṛpatiḥ paśurakṣiṇām // Mn_8.238 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3294: vṛtiṃ tatra prakurvīta yām uṣṭro na vilokayet /
GSD36manu2p_u:3295: chidraṃ ca vārayet sarvaṃ śvasūkaramukhānugam // Mn_8.239 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3296: pathi kṣetre parivṛte grāmāntīye 'tha vā punaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3297: sapālaḥ śatadaṇḍārho vipālān vārayet paśūn // Mn_8.240 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3298: kṣetreṣv anyeṣu tu paśuḥ sapādaṃ paṇam arhati /
GSD36manu2p_u:3299: sarvatra tu sado deyaḥ kṣetrikasyeti dhāraṇā // Mn_8.241 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3300: anirdaśāhāṃ gāṃ sūtāṃ vṛṣān devapaśūṃs tathā /
GSD36manu2p_u:3301: sapālān vā vipālān vā na daṇḍyān manur abravīt // Mn_8.242 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3303: tato 'rdhadaṇḍo bhṛtyānām ajñānāt kṣetrikasya tu // Mn_8.243 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3305: svāmināṃ ca paśūnāṃ ca pālānāṃ ca vyatikrame // Mn_8.244 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3306: sīmāṃ prati samutpanne vivāde grāmayor dvayoḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3307: jyeṣṭhe māsi nayet sīmāṃ suprakāśeṣu setuṣu // Mn_8.245 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3309: śālmalīn sālatālāṃś ca kṣīriṇaś caiva pādapān // Mn_8.246 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3310: gulmān veṇūṃś ca vividhān śamīvallīsthalāni ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:3311: śarān kubjakagulmāṃś ca tathā sīmā na naśyati // Mn_8.247 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3312: taḍāgāny udapānāni vāpyaḥ prasravaṇāni ca // Mn_8.248a[M250] //
GSD36manu2p_u:3315: sīmājñāne nṛṇāṃ vīkṣya nityaṃ loke viparyayam // Mn_8.249 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3317: karīṣam iṣṭakāṅgārāṃś śarkarā vālukās tathā // Mn_8.250[M248] //
GSD36manu2p_u:3318: yāni caivaṃprakārāṇi kālād bhūmir na bhakṣayet /

GSD36manu2p_u:3320: etair liṅgair nayet sīmāṃ rājā vivadamānayoḥ /

GSD36manu2p_u:3322: yadi sṃśaya eva syāl liṅgānām api darśane /

GSD36manu2p_u:3326: te pṛṣṭās tu yathā brūyuḥ samastāḥ sīmni niścayam /

GSD36manu2p_u:3329: sukṛtaiḥ śāpithāḥ svaiḥ svair nayeyus te samañjasam // Mn_8.256 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3331: viparītaṃ nayantas tu dāpyāḥ syur dviśataṃ damam // Mn_8.257 //

GSD36manu2p_u:3353: vaiśye syād ardhapañcāśac chūdre dvādaśako damaḥ // Mn_8.268 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3355: vādeṣv avacanīyeṣu tad eva dviguṇaṃ bhavet // Mn_8.269 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3356: ekajātir dvijātīṃs tu vācā dāruṇayā kṣipan /
GSD36manu2p_u:3357: jihvāyāḥ prāpnuyāc chedaṃ jaghanyaprabhavo hi saḥ // Mn_8.270 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3359: nikṣepyo 'yomayaḥ śaṅkur jvalann āsye daśāṅgulaḥ // Mn_8.271 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3361: taptam āsecayet tailaṃ vaktre śrotre ca pārthivaḥ // Mn_8.272 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3362: śrutaṃ deśaṃ ca jātiṃ ca karma śarīram eva ca /

GSD36manu2p_u:3364: kāṇaṃ vāpy atha vā khañjam anyaṃ vāpi tathāvidham /

GSD36manu2p_u:3366: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ jāyāṃ bhrātaraṃ tanayaṃ gurum /
GSD36manu2p_u:3367: ākṣārayañ śataṃ dāpyaḥ panthānaṃ cādadad guroḥ // Mn_8.275 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3369: brāhmaṇe sāhasaḥ pūrvaḥ kṣatriye tv eva madhyamaḥ // Mn_8.276 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3370: viṭśūdrayor evam eva svajātiṃ prati tattvataḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3374: yena kena cid aṅgena hiṃsyāc cec chreṣṭham antyajaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:3375: chettavyaṃ tad tad evāsya tan manor anuśāsanam // Mn_8.279 //
GSD36manu2p_u:3376: pāṇim udyamya daṇḍaṃ vā pāṇicchedanam arhati /
