GSD36manu2p_u:5210: jhallā mallā naṭāś caiva puruṣāḥ śastravṛttayaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:5211: dyūtapānaprasaktāś ca jaghanyā rājasī gatiḥ // Mn_12.45 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5212: rājānaḥ kṣatriyāś caiva rājñāṃ caiva purohitāḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:5213: vādayuddhapradhānāś ca madhyamā rājasī gatiḥ // Mn_12.46 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5214: gandharvā guhyakā yakṣā vibudhānucarāś ca ye /
GSD36manu2p_u:5216: tāpasā yatayo viprā ye ca vaimānikā gaṇāḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:5217: nakṣatrāṇi ca daityāś ca prathamā sāttvikī gatiḥ // Mn_12.48 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5218: yajvāna ṛṣayo devā vedā jyotīṃṣi vatsarāḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:5219: pitaraś caiva sādhyāś ca dvitīyā sāttvikī gatiḥ // Mn_12.49 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5220: brahmā viśvasṛjo dharmo mahān avyaktam eva ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:5221: uttamāṃ sāttvikīm etāṃ gatim āhur manīṣiṇaḥ // Mn_12.50 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5223: trividhas trividhaḥ kṛtsnaḥ saṃsāraḥ sārvabhautikaḥ // Mn_12.51 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5225: pāpān saṃyānti saṃsārān avidvāṃso narādhamāḥ // Mn_12.52 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5226: yāṃ yāṃ yoniṃ tu jīvo 'yaṃ yena yeneha karmaṇā /
GSD36manu2p_u:5227: kramaśo yāti loke 'smiṃs tat tat sarvaṃ nibodhata // Mn_12.53 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5228: bahūn varṣagaṇān ghorān narakān prāpya tatkṣayāt /
GSD36manu2p_u:5229: saṃsārān pratipadyante mahāpātakinas tv imān // Mn_12.54 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5231: caṇḍālapukkasānāṃ ca brahmahā yonim ṛcchati // Mn_12.55 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5233: hiṃsrāṇāṃ caiva sattvānāṃ surāpo brāhmaṇo vrajet // Mn_12.56 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5235: hiṃsrāṇāṃ ca piśācānāṃ steno vipraḥ sahasraśaḥ // Mn_12.57 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5240: saṃyogaṃ patitair gatvā parasyaiva ca yoṣitam /
GSD36manu2p_u:5241: apahṛtya ca viprasvaṃ bhavati brahmarākṣasaḥ // Mn_12.60 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5243: vividhāṇi ca ratnāni jāyate hemakartṛṣu // Mn_12.61 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5244: dhānyaṃ hṛtvā bhavaty ākhuḥ kāṃsyaṃ haṃso jalaṃ plavaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:5245: madhu daṃśaḥ payaḥ kāko rasaṃ śvā nakulo ghṛtam // Mn_12.62 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5246: māṃsaṃ gṛdhro vapāṃ madgus tailaṃ tailapakaḥ khagaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:5247: cīrīvākas tu lavaṇaṃ balākā śakunir dadhi // Mn_12.63 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5248: kauśeyaṃ tittirir hṛtvā kṣaumaṃ hṛtvā tu darduraḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:5249: kārpāsatāntavaṃ krauñco godhā gāṃ vāggudo guḍam // Mn_12.64 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5250: chucchundariḥ śubhān gandhān patraśākaṃ tu barhiṇaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:5251: śvāvit kṛtānnaṃ vividham akṛtānnaṃ tu śalyakaḥ // Mn_12.65 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5252: bako bhavati hṛtvāgniṃ gṛhakārī hy upaskaram /
GSD36manu2p_u:5253: raktāni hṛtvā vāsāṃsi jāyate jīvajīvakaḥ // Mn_12.66 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5254: vṛko mṛgebhaṃ vyāghro 'śvaṃ phalamūlaṃ tu markaṭaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:5255: strīm ṛkṣaḥ stokako vāri yānāny uṣṭraḥ paśūn ajaḥ // Mn_12.67 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5256: yad vā tad vā paradravyam apahṛtya balān naraḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:5257: avaśyaṃ yāti tiryaktvaṃ jagdhvā caivāhutaṃ haviḥ // Mn_12.68 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5258: striyo 'py etena kalpena hṛtvā doṣam avāpnuyuḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:5259: eteṣām eva jantūnāṃ bhāryātvam upayānti tāḥ // Mn_12.69 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5260: svebhyaḥ svebhyas tu karmabhyaś cyutā varṇā hy anāpadi /
GSD36manu2p_u:5261: pāpān saṃsṛtya saṃsārān preṣyatāṃ yānti śatruṣu // Mn_12.70 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5262: vāntāśy ulkāmukhaḥ preto vipro dharmāt svakāc cyutaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:5265: cailāśakaś ca bhavati śūdro dharmāt svakāc cyutaḥ // Mn_12.72 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5267: tathā tathā kuśalatā teṣāṃ teṣūpajāyate // Mn_12.73 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5269: saṃprāpnuvanti duḥkhāni tāsu tāsv iha yoniṣu // Mn_12.74 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5272: vividhāś caiva saṃpīḍāḥ kākolūkaiś ca bhakṣaṇam /
GSD36manu2p_u:5275: śītātapābhighātāṃś ca vividhāni bhayāni ca // Mn_12.77 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5276: asakṛd garbhavāseṣu vāsaṃ janma ca dāruṇam /
GSD36manu2p_u:5277: bandhanāni ca kāṣṭhāni parapreṣyatvam eva ca // Mn_12.78 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5279: dravyārjanaṃ ca nāśaṃ ca mitrāmitrasya cārjanam // Mn_12.79 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5281: kleśāṃś ca vividhāṃs tāṃs tān mṛtyum eva ca durjayam // Mn_12.80 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5282: yādṛśena tu bhāvena yad yat karma niṣevate /
GSD36manu2p_u:5283: tādṛśena śarīreṇa tat tat phalam upāśnute // Mn_12.81 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5284: eṣa sarvaḥ samuddiṣṭaḥ karmaṇāṃ vaḥ phalodayaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:5286: vedābhyāsas tapo jñānam indriyāṇāṃ ca saṃyamaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:5287: ahiṃsā gurusevā ca niḥśreyasakaraṃ param // Mn_12.83 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5288: sarveṣām api caiteṣāṃ śubhānām iha karmaṇām /
GSD36manu2p_u:5289: kiṃ cic chreyaskarataraṃ karmoktaṃ puruṣaṃ prati // Mn_12.84 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5290: sarveṣām api caiteṣām ātmajñānaṃ paraṃ smṛtam /
GSD36manu2p_u:5291: tad dhy agryaṃ sarvavidyānāṃ prāpyate hy amṛtaṃ tataḥ // Mn_12.85 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5292: ṣaṇṇām eṣāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ pretya ceha ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:5293: śreyaskarataraṃ jñeyaṃ sarvadā karma vaidikam // Mn_12.86 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5294: vaidike karmayoge tu sarvāṇy etāny aśeṣataḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:5295: antarbhavanti kramaśas tasmiṃs tasmin kriyāvidhau // Mn_12.87 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5297: pravṛttaṃ ca nivṛttaṃ ca dvividhaṃ karma vaidikam // Mn_12.88 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5298: iha cāmutra vā kāmyaṃ pravṛttaṃ karma kīrtyate /
GSD36manu2p_u:5299: niṣkāmaṃ jñātapūrvaṃ tu nivṛttam upadiśyate // Mn_12.89 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5300: pravṛttaṃ karma saṃsevyaṃ devānām eti sāmyatām /
GSD36manu2p_u:5301: nivṛttaṃ sevamānas tu bhūtāny atyeti pañca vai // Mn_12.90 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5303: samaṃ paśyann ātmayājī svārājyam adhigacchati // Mn_12.91 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5305: ātmajñāne śame ca syād vedābhyāse ca yatnavān // Mn_12.92 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5307: prāpyaitat kṛtakṛtyo hi dvijo bhavati nānyathā // Mn_12.93 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5309: aśakyaṃ cāprameyaṃ ca vedaśāstram iti sthitiḥ // Mn_12.94 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5310: yā vedabāhyāḥ smṛtayo yāś ca kāś ca kudṛṣṭayaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:5311: sarvās tā niṣphalāḥ pretya tamoniṣṭhā hi tāḥ smṛtāḥ // Mn_12.95 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5312: utpadyante cyavante ca yāny ato 'nyāni kāni cit /
GSD36manu2p_u:5313: tāny arvākkālikatayā niṣphalāny anṛtāni ca // Mn_12.96 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5314: cāturvarṇyaṃ trayo lokāś catvāraś cāśramāḥ pṛthak /
GSD36manu2p_u:5315: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca sarvaṃ vedāt prasidhyati // Mn_12.97 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5316: śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaś ca pañcamaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:5317: vedād eva prasūyante prasūtir guṇakarmataḥ // Mn_12.98 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5319: tasmād etat paraṃ manye yaj jantor asya sādhanam // Mn_12.99 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5320: senāpatyaṃ ca rājyaṃ ca daṇḍanetṛtvam eva ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:5322: yathā jātabalo vahnir dahaty ārdrān api drumān /
GSD36manu2p_u:5323: tathā dahati vedajñaḥ karmajaṃ doṣam ātmanaḥ // Mn_12.101 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5325: ihaiva loke tiṣṭhan sa brahmabhūyāya kalpate // Mn_12.102 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5326: ajñebhyo granthinaḥ śreṣṭhā granthibhyo dhāriṇo varāḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:5327: dhāribhyo jñāninaḥ śreṣṭhā jñānibhyo vyavasāyinaḥ // Mn_12.103 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5328: tapo vidyā ca viprasya niḥśreyasakaraṃ param /
GSD36manu2p_u:5329: tapasā kilbiṣaṃ hanti vidyayāmṛtam aśnute // Mn_12.104 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5330: pratyakṣaṃ cānumānaṃ ca śāstraṃ ca vividhāgamam /
GSD36manu2p_u:5331: trayaṃ suviditaṃ kāryaṃ dharmaśuddhim abhīpsatā // Mn_12.105 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5333: yas tarkeṇānusaṃdhatte sa dharmaṃ veda netaraḥ // Mn_12.106 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5336: anāmnāteṣu dharmeṣu kathaṃ syād iti ced bhavet /
GSD36manu2p_u:5337: yaṃ śiṣṭā brāhmaṇā brūyuḥ sa dharmaḥ syād aśaṅkitaḥ // Mn_12.108 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5339: te śiṣṭā brāhmaṇā jñeyāḥ śrutipratyakṣahetavaḥ // Mn_12.109 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5340: daśāvarā vā pariṣad yaṃ dharmaṃ parikalpayet /
GSD36manu2p_u:5341: tryavarā vāpi vṛttasthā taṃ dharmaṃ na vicālayet // Mn_12.110 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5343: trayaś cāśramiṇaḥ pūrve pariṣat syād daśāvarā // Mn_12.111 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5344: ṛgvedavid yajurvic ca sāmavedavid eva ca /
GSD36manu2p_u:5346: eko 'pi vedavid dharmaṃ yaṃ vyavasyed dvijottamaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:5347: sa vijñeyaḥ paro dharmo nājñānām udito 'yutaiḥ // Mn_12.113 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5349: sahasraśaḥ sametānāṃ pariṣattvaṃ na vidyate // Mn_12.114 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5350: yaṃ vadanti tamobhūtā mūrkhā dharmam atadvidaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:5351: tatpāpaṃ śatadhā bhūtvā tadvaktṝn anugacchati // Mn_12.115 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5353: asmād apracyuto vipraḥ prāpnoti paramāṃ gatim // Mn_12.116 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5354: evaṃ sa bhagavān devo lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā /
GSD36manu2p_u:5355: dharmasya paramaṃ guhyaṃ mamedaṃ sarvam uktavān // Mn_12.117 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5356: sarvam ātmani saṃpaśyet sac cāsac ca samāhitaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:5357: sarvaṃ hy ātmani saṃpaśyan nādharme kurute manaḥ // Mn_12.118 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5358: ātmaiva devatāḥ sarvāḥ sarvam ātmany avasthitam /
GSD36manu2p_u:5359: ātmā hi janayaty eṣāṃ karmayogaṃ śarīriṇām // Mn_12.119 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5361: paktidṛṣṭyoḥ paraṃ tejaḥ snehe 'po gāṃ ca mūrtiṣu // Mn_12.120 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5362: manasīnduṃ diśaḥ śrotre krānte viṣṇuṃ bale haram /
GSD36manu2p_u:5363: vācy agniṃ mitram utsarge prajane ca prajāpatim // Mn_12.121 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5365: rukmābhaṃ svapnadhīgamyaṃ vidyāt taṃ puruṣaṃ param // Mn_12.122 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5366: etam eke vadanty agniṃ manum anye prajāpatim /
GSD36manu2p_u:5367: indram eke pare prāṇam apare brahma śāśvatam // Mn_12.123 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5368: eṣa sarvāṇi bhūtāni pañcabhir vyāpya mūrtibhiḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:5370: evaṃ yaḥ sarvabhūteṣu paśyaty ātmānam ātmanā /
GSD36manu2p_u:5371: sa sarvasamatām etya brahmābhyeti paraṃ padam // Mn_12.125 //
GSD36manu2p_u:5372: ity etan mānavaṃ śāstraṃ bhṛguproktaṃ paṭhan dvijaḥ /
GSD36manu2p_u:5373: bhavaty ācāravān nityaṃ yatheṣṭāṃ prāpnuyād gatim // Mn_12.126 //
